◆ init_geo_wind_profile()

void ERF::init_geo_wind_profile ( const std::string  input_file,
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  u_geos,
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > &  u_geos_d,
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  v_geos,
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > &  v_geos_d,
const amrex::Geometry &  lgeom,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  zlev_stag 
)
private
17 {
18  const int klo = 0;
19  const int khi = lgeom.Domain().bigEnd()[AMREX_SPACEDIM-1];
20  const amrex::Real dz = lgeom.CellSize()[AMREX_SPACEDIM-1];
21 
22  const bool grid_stretch = (zlev_stag.size() > 0);
23  const Real zbot = (grid_stretch) ? zlev_stag[klo] : lgeom.ProbLo(AMREX_SPACEDIM-1);
24  const Real ztop = (grid_stretch) ? zlev_stag[khi+1] : lgeom.ProbHi(AMREX_SPACEDIM-1);
25 
26  amrex::Print() << "Reading geostrophic wind profile from " << input_file << std::endl;
27  std::ifstream profile_reader(input_file);
28  if(!profile_reader.is_open()) {
29  amrex::Error("Error opening the abl_geo_wind_table\n");
30  }
31 
32  // First, read the input data into temp vectors
33  std::string line;
34  Vector<Real> z_inp, Ug_inp, Vg_inp;
35  Real z, Ug, Vg;
36  amrex::Print() << "z Ug Vg" << std::endl;
37  while(std::getline(profile_reader, line)) {
38  std::istringstream iss(line);
39  iss >> z >> Ug >> Vg;
40  amrex::Print() << z << " " << Ug << " " << Vg << std::endl;
41  z_inp.push_back(z);
42  Ug_inp.push_back(Ug);
43  Vg_inp.push_back(Vg);
44  if (z >= ztop) break;
45  }
46 
47  const int Ninp = z_inp.size();
48  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(z_inp[0] <= zbot);
49  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(z_inp[Ninp-1] >= ztop);
50 
51  // Now, interpolate vectors to the cell centers
52  for (int k = 0; k <= khi; k++) {
53  z = (grid_stretch) ? 0.5 * (zlev_stag[k] + zlev_stag[k+1])
54  : zbot + (k + 0.5) * dz;
55  u_geos[k] = interpolate_1d(z_inp.dataPtr(), Ug_inp.dataPtr(), z, Ninp);
56  v_geos[k] = interpolate_1d(z_inp.dataPtr(), Vg_inp.dataPtr(), z, Ninp);
57  }
58 
59  // Copy from host version to device version
60  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, u_geos.begin(), u_geos.end(), u_geos_d.begin());
61  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, v_geos.begin(), v_geos.end(), v_geos_d.begin());
62 
63  profile_reader.close();
64 }
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_only()

void ERF::init_only ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)
1530 {
1531  t_new[lev] = time;
1532  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
1533 
1534  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
1535  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
1536 
1537  // Loop over grids at this level to initialize our grid data
1538  lev_new[Vars::cons].setVal(0.0); lev_old[Vars::cons].setVal(0.0);
1539  lev_new[Vars::xvel].setVal(0.0); lev_old[Vars::xvel].setVal(0.0);
1540  lev_new[Vars::yvel].setVal(0.0); lev_old[Vars::yvel].setVal(0.0);
1541  lev_new[Vars::zvel].setVal(0.0); lev_old[Vars::zvel].setVal(0.0);
1542 
1543  // Initialize background flow (optional)
1544  if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Input_Sounding) {
1545  // The base state is initialized by integrating vertically through the
1546  // input sounding, if the init_sounding_ideal flag is set; otherwise
1547  // it is set by initHSE()
1548 
1549  // The physbc's need the terrain but are needed for initHSE
1550  // We have already made the terrain in the call to init_zphys
1551  // in MakeNewLevelFromScratch
1552  make_physbcs(lev);
1553 
1554  // Now init the base state and the data itself
1555  init_from_input_sounding(lev);
1556 
1557  if (init_sounding_ideal) {
1558  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT_WITH_MESSAGE(solverChoice.use_gravity,
1559  "Gravity should be on to be consistent with sounding initialization.");
1560  } else {
1561  initHSE();
1562  }
1563 
1564 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1565  }
1566  else if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::WRFInput)
1567  {
1568  // The base state is initialized from WRF wrfinput data, output by
1569  // ideal.exe or real.exe
1570  init_from_wrfinput(lev, *mf_C1H[lev], *mf_C2H[lev], *mf_MUB[lev]);
1571  if (lev==0) {
1572  if ((start_time > 0) && (start_time != t_new[lev])) {
1573  Print() << "Ignoring specified start_time="
1574  << std::setprecision(timeprecision) << start_time
1575  << std::endl;
1576  }
1577  start_time = t_new[lev];
1578  }
1579  use_datetime = true;
1580 
1581  // The physbc's need the terrain but are needed for initHSE
1582  if (!solverChoice.use_real_bcs) {
1583  make_physbcs(lev);
1584  }
1585  }
1586  else if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::NCFile)
1587  {
1588  // The state is initialized by reading from a Netcdf file
1589  init_from_ncfile(lev);
1590 
1591  // The physbc's need the terrain but are needed for initHSE
1592  make_physbcs(lev);
1593  }
1594  else if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Metgrid)
1595  {
1596  // The base state is initialized from data output by WPS metgrid;
1597  // we will rebalance after interpolation
1598  init_from_metgrid(lev);
1599 #endif
1600  } else if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Uniform) {
1601  // Initialize a uniform background field and base state based on the
1602  // problem-specified reference density and temperature
1603 
1604  // The physbc's need the terrain but are needed for initHSE
1605  make_physbcs(lev);
1606 
1607  init_uniform(lev);
1608  initHSE(lev);
1609  } else {
1610  // No background flow initialization specified, initialize the
1611  // background field to be equal to the base state, calculated from the
1612  // problem-specific erf_init_dens_hse
1613 
1614  // The bc's need the terrain but are needed for initHSE
1615  make_physbcs(lev);
1616 
1617  // We will initialize the state from the background state so must set that first
1618  initHSE(lev);
1619  init_from_hse(lev);
1620  }
1621 
1622  // Add problem-specific flow features
1623  //
1624  // Notes:
1625  // - This calls init_custom_pert that is defined for each problem
1626  // - This may modify the base state
1627  // - The fields set by init_custom_pert are **perturbations** to the
1628  // background flow set based on init_type
1629  if (solverChoice.init_type != InitType::NCFile) {
1630  init_custom(lev);
1631  }
1632 
1633  // Ensure that the face-based data are the same on both sides of a periodic domain.
1634  // The data associated with the lower grid ID is considered the correct value.
1635  lev_new[Vars::xvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
1636  lev_new[Vars::yvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
1637  lev_new[Vars::zvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
1638 
1639  if(solverChoice.spongeChoice.sponge_type == "input_sponge"){
1640  input_sponge(lev);
1641  }
1642 
1643  // Initialize turbulent perturbation
1644  if (solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Source ||
1645  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Direct ||
1646  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::CPM) {
1647  turbPert_update(lev, 0.);
1648  turbPert_amplitude(lev);
1649  }
1650 }

◆ init_stuff()

void ERF::init_stuff ( int  lev,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm,
amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &  lev_new,
amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &  lev_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  tmp_base_state,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  tmp_zphys_nd 
)
private
28 {
29  // ********************************************************************************************
30  // Base state holds r_0, pres_0, pi_0, th_0 (in that order)
31  //
32  // Here is where we set 3 ghost cells for the base state!
33  //
34  // ********************************************************************************************
35  tmp_base_state.define(ba,dm,BaseState::num_comps,3);
36  tmp_base_state.setVal(0.);
37 
38  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::MovingFittedMesh) {
39  base_state_new[lev].define(ba,dm,BaseState::num_comps,base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
40  base_state_new[lev].setVal(0.);
41  }
42 
43  // ********************************************************************************************
44  // Allocate terrain arrays
45  // ********************************************************************************************
46 
47  BoxArray ba_nd(ba);
48  ba_nd.surroundingNodes();
49 
50  // NOTE: this is where we actually allocate z_phys_nd -- but here it's called "tmp_zphys_nd"
51  // We need this to be one greater than the ghost cells to handle levels > 0
52 
53  int ngrow = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice) + 2;
54  tmp_zphys_nd = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,ngrow));
55 
56  z_phys_cc[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
57  init_default_zphys(lev, geom[lev], *tmp_zphys_nd, *z_phys_cc[lev]);
58 
59  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::MovingFittedMesh)
60  {
61  detJ_cc_new[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
62  detJ_cc_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
63 
64  ax_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,1);
65  ay_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,1);
66  az_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(0,0,1)),dm,1,1);
67 
68  z_t_rk[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>( convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, 1 );
69 
70  z_phys_nd_new[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,ngrow));
71  z_phys_nd_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,ngrow));
72  z_phys_cc_src[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
73  }
74  else
75  {
76  z_phys_nd_new[lev] = nullptr;
77  detJ_cc_new[lev] = nullptr;
78 
79  z_phys_nd_src[lev] = nullptr;
80  z_phys_cc_src[lev] = nullptr;
81  detJ_cc_src[lev] = nullptr;
82 
83  z_t_rk[lev] = nullptr;
84  }
85 
86  if (SolverChoice::terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing)
87  {
88  terrain_blanking[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,ngrow);
89  terrain_blanking[lev]->setVal(1.0);
90  }
91 
92  // We use these area arrays regardless of terrain, EB or none of the above
93  detJ_cc[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
94  ax[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,1);
95  ay[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,1);
96  az[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba,IntVect(0,0,1)),dm,1,1);
97 
98  detJ_cc[lev]->setVal(1.0);
99  ax[lev]->setVal(1.0);
100  ay[lev]->setVal(1.0);
101  az[lev]->setVal(1.0);
102 
103  // ********************************************************************************************
104  // Create wall distance array for RANS modeling
105  // ********************************************************************************************
106  if (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].rans_type != RANSType::None) {
107  walldist[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,1);
108  walldist[lev]->setVal(1e23);
109  } else {
110  walldist[lev] = nullptr;
111  }
112 
113  // ********************************************************************************************
114  // These are the persistent containers for the old and new data
115  // ********************************************************************************************
116  int ncomp;
117  if (lev > 0) {
118  ncomp = vars_new[lev-1][Vars::cons].nComp();
119  } else {
120  int n_qstate = micro->Get_Qstate_Size();
121  ncomp = NDRY + NSCALARS + n_qstate;
122  }
123 
124  // ********************************************************************************************
125  // The number of ghost cells for density must be 1 greater than that for velocity
126  // so that we can go back in forth between velocity and momentum on all faces
127  // ********************************************************************************************
128  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice) + 1;
129  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice);
130 
131  // ********************************************************************************************
132  // New solution data containers
133  // ********************************************************************************************
134  lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, ncomp, ngrow_state);
135  lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, ncomp, ngrow_state);
136 
137  lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
138  lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
139 
140  lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
141  lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
142 
143  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, 1); gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].setVal(0.);
144  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, 1); gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].setVal(0.);
145  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, 1); gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].setVal(0.);
146 
147  // Note that we need the ghost cells in the z-direction if we are doing any
148  // kind of domain decomposition in the vertical (at level 0 or above)
149  lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
150  lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
151 
152  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1 || solverChoice.project_initial_velocity) {
153  pp_inc[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, 1);
154  pp_inc[lev].setVal(0.0);
155  }
156 
157  // ********************************************************************************************
158  // These are just used for scratch in the time integrator but we might as well define them here
159  // ********************************************************************************************
160  rU_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
161  rU_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
162 
163  rV_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
164  rV_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
165 
166  rW_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
167  rW_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
168 
169  if (lev > 0) {
170  //xmom_crse_rhs[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, IntVect{0});
171  //ymom_crse_rhs[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, IntVect{0});
172  zmom_crse_rhs[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect{0});
173  }
174 
175  // We do this here just so they won't be undefined in the initial FillPatch
176  rU_old[lev].setVal(1.2e21);
177  rV_old[lev].setVal(3.4e22);
178  rW_old[lev].setVal(5.6e23);
179  rU_new[lev].setVal(1.2e21);
180  rV_new[lev].setVal(3.4e22);
181  rW_new[lev].setVal(5.6e23);
182 
183  // ********************************************************************************************
184  // These are just time averaged fields for diagnostics
185  // ********************************************************************************************
186 
187  // NOTE: We are not completing a fillpach call on the time averaged data;
188  // which would copy on intersection and interpolate from coarse.
189  // Therefore, we are restarting the averaging when the ba changes,
190  // this may give poor statistics for dynamic mesh refinement.
191  vel_t_avg[lev] = nullptr;
192  if (solverChoice.time_avg_vel) {
193  vel_t_avg[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba, dm, 4, 0); // Each vel comp and the mag
194  vel_t_avg[lev]->setVal(0.0);
195  t_avg_cnt[lev] = 0.0;
196  }
197 
198  // ********************************************************************************************
199  // Initialize flux registers whenever we create/re-create a level
200  // ********************************************************************************************
201  if (solverChoice.coupling_type == CouplingType::TwoWay) {
202  if (lev == 0) {
203  advflux_reg[0] = nullptr;
204  } else {
205  int ncomp_reflux = vars_new[0][Vars::cons].nComp();
206  advflux_reg[lev] = new YAFluxRegister(ba , grids[lev-1],
207  dm , dmap[lev-1],
208  geom[lev], geom[lev-1],
209  ref_ratio[lev-1], lev, ncomp_reflux);
210  }
211  }
212 
213  // ********************************************************************************************
214  // Define Theta_prim storage if using surface_layer BC
215  // ********************************************************************************************
216  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::surface_layer) {
217  Theta_prim[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow_state,ngrow_state,1));
218  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None) {
219  Qv_prim[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow_state,ngrow_state,1));
220  Qr_prim[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow_state,ngrow_state,1));
221  } else {
222  Qv_prim[lev] = nullptr;
223  Qr_prim[lev] = nullptr;
224  }
225  } else {
226  Theta_prim[lev] = nullptr;
227  Qv_prim[lev] = nullptr;
228  Qr_prim[lev] = nullptr;
229  }
230 
231  // ********************************************************************************************
232  // Map factors
233  // ********************************************************************************************
234  BoxList bl2d_mf = ba.boxList();
235  for (auto& b : bl2d_mf) {
236  b.setRange(2,0);
237  }
238  BoxArray ba2d_mf(std::move(bl2d_mf));
239 
240  mapfac[lev].resize(MapFacType::num);
241  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_mf,dm,1,3);
242  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::u_x] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba2d_mf,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,3);
243  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::v_x] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba2d_mf,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,3);
244 
245 #if 0
246  // For now we comment this out to avoid CI failures but we will need to re-enable
247  // this if using non-conformal mappings
248  if (MapFacType::m_y != MapFacType::m_x) {
249  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_y] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_mf,dm,1,3);
250  }
251  if (MapFacType::u_y != MapFacType::u_x) {
252  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::u_y] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba2d_mf,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,3);
253  }
254  if (MapFacType::v_y != MapFacType::v_x) {
255  mapfac[lev][MapFacType::v_y] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(convert(ba2d_mf,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,3);
256  }
257 #endif
258 
259  if (solverChoice.test_mapfactor) {
260  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
261  mapfac[lev][i]->setVal(0.5);
262  }
263  for (int i = 3; i < mapfac[lev].size(); i++) {
264  mapfac[lev][i]->setVal(0.25);
265  }
266  } else {
267  for (int i = 0; i < mapfac[lev].size(); i++) {
268  mapfac[lev][i]->setVal(1.0);
269  }
270  }
271 
272  // ********************************************************************************************
273  // Build 1D BA and 2D BA
274  // ********************************************************************************************
275  BoxList bl1d = ba.boxList();
276  for (auto& b : bl1d) {
277  b.setRange(0,0);
278  b.setRange(1,0);
279  }
280  ba1d[lev] = BoxArray(std::move(bl1d));
281 
282  // Build 2D BA
283  BoxList bl2d = ba.boxList();
284  for (auto& b : bl2d) {
285  b.setRange(2,0);
286  }
287  ba2d[lev] = BoxArray(std::move(bl2d));
288 
289  IntVect ng = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].nGrowVect();
290 
291  mf_C1H[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba1d[lev],dm,1,ng);
292  mf_C2H[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba1d[lev],dm,1,ng);
293  mf_MUB[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d[lev],dm,1,ng);
294 
295  //*********************************************************
296  // Variables for Fitch model for windfarm parametrization
297  //*********************************************************
298 #if defined(ERF_USE_WINDFARM)
299  if (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::Fitch){
300  vars_windfarm[lev].define(ba, dm, 5, ngrow_state); // V, dVabsdt, dudt, dvdt, dTKEdt
301  }
302  if (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::EWP){
303  vars_windfarm[lev].define(ba, dm, 3, ngrow_state); // dudt, dvdt, dTKEdt
304  }
305  if (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::SimpleAD) {
306  vars_windfarm[lev].define(ba, dm, 2, ngrow_state);// dudt, dvdt
307  }
308  if (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::GeneralAD) {
309  vars_windfarm[lev].define(ba, dm, 3, ngrow_state);// dudt, dvdt, dwdt
310  }
311  Nturb[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state); // Number of turbines in a cell
312  SMark[lev].define(ba, dm, 2, 1); // Free stream velocity/source term
313  // sampling marker in a cell - 2 components
314 #endif
315 
316 
317 #ifdef ERF_USE_WW3_COUPLING
318  // create a new BoxArray and DistributionMapping for a MultiFab with 1 box
319  BoxArray ba_onegrid(geom[lev].Domain());
320  BoxList bl2d_onegrid = ba_onegrid.boxList();
321  for (auto& b : bl2d_onegrid) {
322  b.setRange(2,0);
323  }
324  BoxArray ba2d_onegrid(std::move(bl2d_onegrid));
325  Vector<int> pmap;
326  pmap.resize(1);
327  pmap[0]=0;
328  DistributionMapping dm_onegrid(ba2d_onegrid);
329  dm_onegrid.define(pmap);
330 
331  Hwave_onegrid[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_onegrid,dm_onegrid,1,IntVect(1,1,0));
332  Lwave_onegrid[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_onegrid,dm_onegrid,1,IntVect(1,1,0));
333 
334  BoxList bl2d_wave = ba.boxList();
335  for (auto& b : bl2d_wave) {
336  b.setRange(2,0);
337  }
338  BoxArray ba2d_wave(std::move(bl2d_wave));
339 
340  Hwave[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_wave,dm,1,IntVect(3,3,0));
341  Lwave[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba2d_wave,dm,1,IntVect(3,3,0));
342 
343  std::cout<<ba_onegrid<<std::endl;
344  std::cout<<ba2d_onegrid<<std::endl;
345  std::cout<<dm_onegrid<<std::endl;
346 #endif
347 
348 
349  //*********************************************************
350  // Radiation heating source terms
351  //*********************************************************
352  if (solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None || solverChoice.lsm_type != LandSurfaceType::None)
353  {
354  qheating_rates[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba, dm, 2, ngrow_state);
355  qheating_rates[lev]->setVal(0.);
356  }
357 
358  //*********************************************************
359  // Radiation fluxes for coupling to LSM
360  //*********************************************************
361 
362  // NOTE: Finer levels do not need to coincide with the bottom domain boundary
363  // at k=0. We make slabs here with the kmin for a given box. Therefore,
364  // care must be taken before applying these fluxes to an LSM model. For
365 
366  // Radiative fluxes for LSM
367  if (solverChoice.lsm_type != LandSurfaceType::None &&
368  solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None)
369  {
370  BoxList m_bl = ba.boxList();
371  for (auto& b : m_bl) {
372  int kmin = b.smallEnd(2);
373  b.setRange(2,kmin);
374  }
375  BoxArray m_ba(std::move(m_bl));
376 
377  sw_lw_fluxes[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(m_ba, dm, 5, ngrow_state); // SW direct (2), SW diffuse (2), LW
378  solar_zenith[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(m_ba, dm, 2, ngrow_state);
379 
380  sw_lw_fluxes[lev]->setVal(0.);
381  solar_zenith[lev]->setVal(0.);
382  }
383 
384  //*********************************************************
385  // Turbulent perturbation region initialization
386  //*********************************************************
387  if (solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Source ||
388  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Direct ||
389  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::CPM)
390  {
391  amrex::Box bnd_bx = ba.minimalBox();
392  turbPert.init_tpi_type(solverChoice.pert_type);
393  turbPert.init_tpi(lev, bnd_bx.smallEnd(), bnd_bx.bigEnd(), geom[lev].CellSizeArray(),
394  ba, dm, ngrow_state, pp_prefix, refRatio(), max_level);
395  }
396 
397  //
398  // Define the land mask here and set it to all land by default
399  // NOTE: the logic below will BREAK if we have any grids not touching the bottom boundary
400  //
401  {
402  lmask_lev[lev].resize(1);
403  auto ngv = lev_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect(); ngv[2] = 0;
404  BoxList bl2d_mask = ba.boxList();
405  for (auto& b : bl2d_mask) {
406  b.setRange(2,0);
407  }
408  BoxArray ba2d_mask(std::move(bl2d_mask));
409  lmask_lev[lev][0] = std::make_unique<iMultiFab>(ba2d_mask,dm,1,ngv);
410  lmask_lev[lev][0]->setVal(1);
411  lmask_lev[lev][0]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
412  }
413 
414  // Read in tables needed for windfarm simulations
415  // fill in Nturb multifab - number of turbines in each mesh cell
416  // write out the vtk files for wind turbine location and/or
417  // actuator disks
418  #ifdef ERF_USE_WINDFARM
419  //init_windfarm(lev);
420  #endif
421 }

void ERF::init_thin_body ( int  lev,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
641 {
642  //********************************************************************************************
643  // Thin immersed body
644  // *******************************************************************************************
645 #if 0
646  if ((solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.size() > 0) ||
647  (solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.size() > 0) ||
648  (solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.size() > 0))
649  {
650  overset_imask[lev] = std::make_unique<iMultiFab>(ba,dm,1,0);
651  overset_imask[lev]->setVal(1); // == value is unknown (to be solved)
652  }
653 #endif
654 
655  if (solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.size() > 0) {
656  amrex::Print() << "Setting up thin immersed body for "
657  << solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.size() << " xfaces" << std::endl;
658  BoxArray ba_xf(ba);
659  ba_xf.surroundingNodes(0);
660  thin_xforce[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_xf,dm,1,0);
661  thin_xforce[lev]->setVal(0.0);
662  xflux_imask[lev] = std::make_unique<iMultiFab>(ba_xf,dm,1,0);
663  xflux_imask[lev]->setVal(1);
664  for ( MFIter mfi(*xflux_imask[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
665  {
666  Array4<int> const& imask_arr = xflux_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
667  //Array4<int> const& imask_cell_arr = overset_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
668  Box xbx = mfi.nodaltilebox(0);
669  for (int iv=0; iv < solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.size(); ++iv) {
670  const auto& faceidx = solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux[iv];
671  if ((faceidx[0] >= xbx.smallEnd(0)) && (faceidx[0] <= xbx.bigEnd(0)) &&
672  (faceidx[1] >= xbx.smallEnd(1)) && (faceidx[1] <= xbx.bigEnd(1)) &&
673  (faceidx[2] >= xbx.smallEnd(2)) && (faceidx[2] <= xbx.bigEnd(2)))
674  {
675  imask_arr(faceidx[0],faceidx[1],faceidx[2]) = 0;
676  //imask_cell_arr(faceidx[0],faceidx[1],faceidx[2]) = 0;
677  //imask_cell_arr(faceidx[0]-1,faceidx[1],faceidx[2]) = 0;
678  amrex::AllPrint() << " mask xface at " << faceidx << std::endl;
679  }
680  }
681  }
682  } else {
683  thin_xforce[lev] = nullptr;
684  xflux_imask[lev] = nullptr;
685  }
686 
687  if (solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.size() > 0) {
688  amrex::Print() << "Setting up thin immersed body for "
689  << solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.size() << " yfaces" << std::endl;
690  BoxArray ba_yf(ba);
691  ba_yf.surroundingNodes(1);
692  thin_yforce[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_yf,dm,1,0);
693  thin_yforce[lev]->setVal(0.0);
694  yflux_imask[lev] = std::make_unique<iMultiFab>(ba_yf,dm,1,0);
695  yflux_imask[lev]->setVal(1);
696  for ( MFIter mfi(*yflux_imask[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
697  {
698  Array4<int> const& imask_arr = yflux_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
699  //Array4<int> const& imask_cell_arr = overset_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
700  Box ybx = mfi.nodaltilebox(1);
701  for (int iv=0; iv < solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.size(); ++iv) {
702  const auto& faceidx = solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux[iv];
703  if ((faceidx[0] >= ybx.smallEnd(0)) && (faceidx[0] <= ybx.bigEnd(0)) &&
704  (faceidx[1] >= ybx.smallEnd(1)) && (faceidx[1] <= ybx.bigEnd(1)) &&
705  (faceidx[2] >= ybx.smallEnd(2)) && (faceidx[2] <= ybx.bigEnd(2)))
706  {
707  imask_arr(faceidx[0],faceidx[1],faceidx[2]) = 0;
708  //imask_cell_arr(faceidx[0],faceidx[1],faceidx[2]) = 0;
709  //imask_cell_arr(faceidx[0],faceidx[1]-1,faceidx[2]) = 0;
710  amrex::AllPrint() << " mask yface at " << faceidx << std::endl;
711  }
712  }
713  }
714  } else {
715  thin_yforce[lev] = nullptr;
716  yflux_imask[lev] = nullptr;
717  }
718 
719  if (solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.size() > 0) {
720  amrex::Print() << "Setting up thin immersed body for "
721  << solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.size() << " zfaces" << std::endl;
722  BoxArray ba_zf(ba);
723  ba_zf.surroundingNodes(2);
724  thin_zforce[lev] = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_zf,dm,1,0);
725  thin_zforce[lev]->setVal(0.0);
726  zflux_imask[lev] = std::make_unique<iMultiFab>(ba_zf,dm,1,0);
727  zflux_imask[lev]->setVal(1);
728  for ( MFIter mfi(*zflux_imask[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
729  {
730  Array4<int> const& imask_arr = zflux_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
731  //Array4<int> const& imask_cell_arr = overset_imask[lev]->array(mfi);
732  Box zbx = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
733  for (int iv=0; iv < solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.size(); ++iv) {
734  const auto& faceidx = solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux[iv];
735  if ((faceidx[0] >= zbx.smallEnd(0)) && (faceidx[0] <= zbx.bigEnd(0)) &&
736  (faceidx[1] >= zbx.smallEnd(1)) && (faceidx[1] <= zbx.bigEnd(1)) &&
737  (faceidx[2] >= zbx.smallEnd(2)) && (faceidx[2] <= zbx.bigEnd(2)))

Parameters

◆ init_zphys()

void ERF::init_zphys ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)
515 {
516  if (solverChoice.init_type != InitType::WRFInput && solverChoice.init_type != InitType::Metgrid)
517  {
518  if (lev > 0) {
519  //
520  // First interpolate from coarser level if there is one
521  // NOTE: this interpolater assumes that ALL ghost cells of the coarse MultiFab
522  // have been pre-filled - this includes ghost cells both inside and outside
523  // the domain
524  //
525  InterpFromCoarseLevel(*z_phys_nd[lev], z_phys_nd[lev]->nGrowVect(),
526  IntVect(0,0,0), // do not fill ghost cells outside the domain
527  *z_phys_nd[lev-1], 0, 0, 1,
528  geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
529  refRatio(lev-1), &node_bilinear_interp,
530  domain_bcs_type, BCVars::cons_bc);
531  }
532 
533  int ngrow = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice) + 2;
534  Box bx(surroundingNodes(Geom(lev).Domain())); bx.grow(ngrow);
535  FArrayBox terrain_fab(makeSlab(bx,2,0),1);
536 
537  //
538  // If we are using fitted mesh then we use the surface as defined above
539  // If we are not using fitted mesh but are using z_levels, we still need z_phys (for now)
540  // but we need to use a flat terrain for the mesh itself (the EB data has already been made
541  // from the correct terrain)
542  //
543  if (solverChoice.terrain_type != TerrainType::StaticFittedMesh &&
544  solverChoice.terrain_type != TerrainType::MovingFittedMesh) {
545  terrain_fab.template setVal<RunOn::Device>(0.0);
546  } else {
547  //
548  // Fill the values of the terrain height at k=0 only
549  //
550  prob->init_terrain_surface(geom[lev],terrain_fab,time);
551  }
552 
553  for (MFIter mfi(*z_phys_nd[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
554  {
555  Box isect = terrain_fab.box() & (*z_phys_nd[lev])[mfi].box();
556  if (!isect.isEmpty()) {
557  (*z_phys_nd[lev])[mfi].template copy<RunOn::Device>(terrain_fab,isect,0,isect,0,1);
558  }
559  }
560 
561  make_terrain_fitted_coords(lev,geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],zlevels_stag[lev],phys_bc_type);
562 
563  z_phys_nd[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
564 
565  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing) {
566  terrain_blanking[lev]->setVal(1.0);
567  MultiFab::Subtract(*terrain_blanking[lev], EBFactory(lev).getVolFrac(), 0, 0, 1, ngrow);
568  terrain_blanking[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
569  }
570 
571  if (lev == 0) {
572  Real zmax = z_phys_nd[0]->max(0,0,false);
573  Real rel_diff = (zmax - zlevels_stag[0][zlevels_stag[0].size()-1]) / zmax;
574  if (rel_diff < 1.e-8) {
575  amrex::Print() << "max of zphys_nd " << zmax << std::endl;
576  amrex::Print() << "max of zlevels " << zlevels_stag[0][zlevels_stag[0].size()-1] << std::endl;
577  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT_WITH_MESSAGE(rel_diff < 1.e-8, "Terrain is taller than domain top!");
578  }
579  } // lev == 0
580 
581  } // init_type
582 }

◆ InitData_post()

void ERF::InitData_post ( )
803 {
804  if (restart_chkfile.empty()) {
805  //
806  // Make sure that detJ and z_phys_cc are the average of the data on a finer level if there is one
807  //
808  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
809  for (int crse_lev = finest_level-1; crse_lev >= 0; crse_lev--) {
810  average_down( *detJ_cc[crse_lev+1], *detJ_cc[crse_lev], 0, 1, refRatio(crse_lev));
811  average_down(*z_phys_cc[crse_lev+1], *z_phys_cc[crse_lev], 0, 1, refRatio(crse_lev));
812  }
813  }
814 
815  if (solverChoice.coupling_type == CouplingType::TwoWay) {
816  AverageDown();
817  }
818 
819  if (solverChoice.advChoice.have_zero_flux_faces)
820  {
821  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT_WITH_MESSAGE(finest_level == 0,
822  "Thin immersed body with refinement not currently supported.");
823  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
824  amrex::Print() << "NOTE: Thin immersed body with non-constant dz has not been tested." << std::endl;
825  }
826  }
827 
828 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
829  if (Microphysics::modelType(solverChoice.moisture_type) == MoistureModelType::Lagrangian) {
830  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
831  dynamic_cast<LagrangianMicrophysics&>(*micro).initParticles(z_phys_nd[lev]);
832  }
833  }
834 #endif
835 
836  } else { // Restart from a checkpoint
837 
838  restart();
839 
840  // Create the physbc objects for {cons, u, v, w, base state}
841  // We fill the additional base state ghost cells just in case we have read the old format
842  for (int lev(0); lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
843  make_physbcs(lev);
844  (*physbcs_base[lev])(base_state[lev],0,base_state[lev].nComp(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
845  }
846 
847  if (solverChoice.do_forest_drag) {
848  for (int lev(0); lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
849  m_forest_drag[lev]->define_drag_field(grids[lev], dmap[lev], geom[lev],
850  z_phys_cc[lev].get(), z_phys_nd[lev].get());
851  }
852  }
853 
854 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
855  //
856  // Create the needed bdy_data_xlo etc ... since we don't read it in from checkpoint any more
857  //
858  if (solverChoice.use_real_bcs) {
859 
860  bdy_time_interval = read_times_from_wrfbdy(nc_bdy_file,
861  bdy_data_xlo,bdy_data_xhi,bdy_data_ylo,bdy_data_yhi,
862  start_bdy_time);
863  Real dT = bdy_time_interval;
864 
865  Real time_since_start_old = t_new[0] - start_bdy_time;
866  int n_time_old = static_cast<int>(time_since_start_old / dT);
867 
868  // I don't think this works if lev > 0 ...?
869  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(finest_level == 0);
870  int lev = 0;
871  bool use_moist = (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None);
872  for (int itime = n_time_old; itime < n_time_old+3; itime++)
873  {
874  read_from_wrfbdy(itime,nc_bdy_file,geom[0].Domain(),
875  bdy_data_xlo,bdy_data_xhi,bdy_data_ylo,bdy_data_yhi,
876  real_width);
877  convert_all_wrfbdy_data(itime, geom[0].Domain(), bdy_data_xlo, bdy_data_xhi, bdy_data_ylo, bdy_data_yhi,
878  *mf_MUB[lev], *mf_C1H[lev], *mf_C2H[lev],
879  vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel], vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
880  geom[lev], use_moist);
881  } // itime
882  } // use_real_bcs && lev == 0
883 #endif
884  } // end restart
885 
886 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
887  /* If using a Lagrangian microphysics model, its particle container has now been
888  constructed and initialized (calls to micro->Init). So, add its pointer to
889  ERF::particleData and remove its name from list of unallocated particle containers. */
890  if (Microphysics::modelType(solverChoice.moisture_type) == MoistureModelType::Lagrangian) {
891  const auto& pc_name( dynamic_cast<LagrangianMicrophysics&>(*micro).getName() );
892  const auto& pc_ptr( dynamic_cast<LagrangianMicrophysics&>(*micro).getParticleContainer() );
893  particleData.pushBack(pc_name, pc_ptr);
894  particleData.getNamesUnalloc().remove(pc_name);
895  }
896 #endif
897 
898  if (input_bndry_planes) {
899  // Read the "time.dat" file to know what data is available
900  m_r2d->read_time_file();
901 
902  // We haven't populated dt yet, set to 0 to ensure assert doesn't crash
903  Real dt_dummy = 0.0;
904  m_r2d->read_input_files(t_new[0],dt_dummy,m_bc_extdir_vals);
905  }
906 
907  if (solverChoice.custom_rhotheta_forcing)
908  {
909  h_rhotheta_src.resize(max_level+1, Vector<Real>(0));
910  d_rhotheta_src.resize(max_level+1, Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
911  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
912  const int domlen = geom[lev].Domain().length(2);
913  h_rhotheta_src[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
914  d_rhotheta_src[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
915  prob->update_rhotheta_sources(t_new[0],
916  h_rhotheta_src[lev], d_rhotheta_src[lev],
917  geom[lev], z_phys_cc[lev]);
918  }
919  }
920 
921  if (solverChoice.have_geo_wind_profile)
922  {
923  h_u_geos.resize(max_level+1, Vector<Real>(0));
924  d_u_geos.resize(max_level+1, Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
925  h_v_geos.resize(max_level+1, Vector<Real>(0));
926  d_v_geos.resize(max_level+1, Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
927  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
928  const int domlen = geom[lev].Domain().length(2);
929  h_u_geos[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
930  d_u_geos[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
931  h_v_geos[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
932  d_v_geos[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
933  if (solverChoice.custom_geostrophic_profile) {
934  prob->update_geostrophic_profile(t_new[0],
935  h_u_geos[lev], d_u_geos[lev],
936  h_v_geos[lev], d_v_geos[lev],
937  geom[lev], z_phys_cc[lev]);
938  } else {
939  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz) {
940  amrex::Print() << "Note: 1-D geostrophic wind profile input is not defined for real terrain" << std::endl;
941  }
942  init_geo_wind_profile(solverChoice.abl_geo_wind_table,
943  h_u_geos[lev], d_u_geos[lev],
944  h_v_geos[lev], d_v_geos[lev],
945  geom[lev],
946  zlevels_stag[0]);
947  }
948  }
949  }
950 
951  if (solverChoice.custom_moisture_forcing)
952  {
953  h_rhoqt_src.resize(max_level+1, Vector<Real>(0));
954  d_rhoqt_src.resize(max_level+1, Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
955  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
956  const int domlen = geom[lev].Domain().length(2);
957  h_rhoqt_src[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
958  d_rhoqt_src[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
959  prob->update_rhoqt_sources(t_new[0],
960  h_rhoqt_src[lev], d_rhoqt_src[lev],
961  geom[lev], z_phys_cc[lev]);
962  }
963  }
964 
965  if (solverChoice.custom_w_subsidence)
966  {
967  h_w_subsid.resize(max_level+1, Vector<Real>(0));
968  d_w_subsid.resize(max_level+1, Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
969  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
970  const int domlen = geom[lev].Domain().length(2) + 1; // lives on z-faces
971  h_w_subsid[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
972  d_w_subsid[lev].resize(domlen, 0.0_rt);
973  prob->update_w_subsidence(t_new[0],
974  h_w_subsid[lev], d_w_subsid[lev],
975  geom[lev], z_phys_nd[lev]);
976  }
977  }
978 
979  if (solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_U ||solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_V ||
980  solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_W ||solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_T)
981  {
982  initRayleigh();
983  if (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Input_Sounding)
984  {
985  // Overwrite ubar, vbar, and thetabar with input profiles;
986  // wbar is assumed to be 0. Note: the tau coefficient set by
987  // prob->erf_init_rayleigh() is still used
988  bool restarting = (!restart_chkfile.empty());
989  setRayleighRefFromSounding(restarting);
990  }
991  }
992 
993  // Read in sponge data from input file
994  if(solverChoice.spongeChoice.sponge_type == "input_sponge")
995  {
996  initSponge();
997  bool restarting = (!restart_chkfile.empty());
998  setSpongeRefFromSounding(restarting);
999  }
1000 
1001  if (solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Source ||
1002  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Direct ||
1003  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::CPM) {
1004  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], t_new[0], dt[0], pert_interval, -1.)) {
1005  turbPert.debug(t_new[0]);
1006  }
1007  }
1008 
1009  // We only write the file at level 0 for now
1010  if (output_bndry_planes)
1011  {
1012  // Create the WriteBndryPlanes object so we can handle writing of boundary plane data
1013  m_w2d = std::make_unique<WriteBndryPlanes>(grids,geom);
1014 
1015  Real time = 0.;
1016  if (time >= bndry_output_planes_start_time) {
1017  bool is_moist = (micro->Get_Qstate_Moist_Size() > 0);
1018  m_w2d->write_planes(0, time, vars_new, is_moist);
1019  }
1020  }
1021 
1022  //
1023  // If we are starting from scratch, we have the option to project the initial velocity field
1024  // regardless of how we initialized.
1025  // pp_inc is used as scratch space here; we zero it out after the projection
1026  //
1027  if (restart_chkfile == "")
1028  {
1029  if (solverChoice.project_initial_velocity) {
1030  Real dummy_dt = 1.0;
1031  if (verbose > 0) {
1032  amrex::Print() << "Projecting initial velocity field" << std::endl;
1033  }
1034  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1035  {
1036  project_velocity(lev, dummy_dt);
1037  pp_inc[lev].setVal(0.);
1038  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].setVal(0.);
1039  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].setVal(0.);
1040  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].setVal(0.);
1041  }
1042  }
1043  }
1044 
1045  // Copy from new into old just in case
1046  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1047  {
1048  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
1049  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
1050 
1051  // ***************************************************************************
1052  // Physical bc's at domain boundary
1053  // ***************************************************************************
1054  IntVect ngvect_cons = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].nGrowVect();
1055  IntVect ngvect_vels = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].nGrowVect();
1056 
1057  int ncomp_cons = lev_new[Vars::cons].nComp();
1058  bool do_fb = true;
1059 
1060 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1061  // We call this here because it is an ERF routine
1062  if (solverChoice.use_real_bcs && (lev==0)) {
1063  int icomp_cons = 0;
1064  bool cons_only = false;
1065  Vector<MultiFab*> mfs_vec = {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&lev_new[Vars::xvel],
1066  &lev_new[Vars::yvel],&lev_new[Vars::zvel]};
1067  fill_from_realbdy(mfs_vec,t_new[lev],cons_only,icomp_cons,
1068  ncomp_cons,ngvect_cons,ngvect_vels);
1069  do_fb = false;
1070  }
1071 #endif
1072 
1073  (*physbcs_cons[lev])(lev_new[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,ncomp_cons,
1074  ngvect_cons,t_new[lev],BCVars::cons_bc,do_fb);
1075  ( *physbcs_u[lev])(lev_new[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],
1076  ngvect_vels,t_new[lev],BCVars::xvel_bc,do_fb);
1077  ( *physbcs_v[lev])(lev_new[Vars::yvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],
1078  ngvect_vels,t_new[lev],BCVars::yvel_bc,do_fb);
1079  ( *physbcs_w[lev])(lev_new[Vars::zvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],
1080  ngvect_vels,t_new[lev],BCVars::zvel_bc,do_fb);
1081 
1082  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::cons],0,0,ncomp_cons,lev_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());
1083  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],0,0, 1,lev_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
1084  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::yvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,0, 1,lev_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
1085  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::zvel],lev_new[Vars::zvel],0,0, 1,lev_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
1086  }
1087 
1088  // Compute the minimum dz in the domain at each level (to be used for setting the timestep)
1089  dz_min.resize(max_level+1);
1090  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1091  {
1092  dz_min[lev] = geom[lev].CellSize(2);
1093  if ( SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz ) {
1094  dz_min[lev] *= (*detJ_cc[lev]).min(0);
1095  }
1096  }
1097 
1098  ComputeDt();
1099 
1100  // Check the viscous limit
1101  DiffChoice dc = solverChoice.diffChoice;
1102  if (dc.molec_diff_type == MolecDiffType::Constant ||
1103  dc.molec_diff_type == MolecDiffType::ConstantAlpha) {
1104  Real delta = std::min({geom[finest_level].CellSize(0),
1105  geom[finest_level].CellSize(1),
1106  dz_min[finest_level]});
1107  if (dc.dynamic_viscosity == 0) {
1108  Print() << "Note: Molecular diffusion specified but dynamic_viscosity has not been specified" << std::endl;
1109  } else {
1110  Real nu = dc.dynamic_viscosity / dc.rho0_trans;
1111  Real viscous_limit = 0.5 * delta*delta / nu;
1112  Print() << "Viscous CFL is " << dt[finest_level] / viscous_limit << std::endl;
1113  if (fixed_dt[finest_level] >= viscous_limit) {
1114  Warning("Specified fixed_dt is above the viscous limit");
1115  } else if (dt[finest_level] >= viscous_limit) {
1116  Warning("Adaptive dt based on convective CFL only is above the viscous limit");
1117  }
1118  }
1119  }
1120 
1121  // Fill ghost cells/faces
1122  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1123  {
1124  if (lev > 0 && cf_width >= 0) {
1125  Construct_ERFFillPatchers(lev);
1126  }
1127 
1128  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
1129 
1130  //
1131  // Fill boundary conditions -- not sure why we need this here
1132  //
1133  bool fillset = false;
1134  if (lev == 0) {
1135  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev],
1136  {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&lev_new[Vars::xvel],&lev_new[Vars::yvel],&lev_new[Vars::zvel]});
1137  } else {
1138  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev],
1139  {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&lev_new[Vars::xvel],&lev_new[Vars::yvel],&lev_new[Vars::zvel]},
1140  {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&rU_new[lev],&rV_new[lev],&rW_new[lev]},
1141  base_state[lev], base_state[lev],
1142  fillset);
1143  }
1144 
1145  //
1146  // We do this here to make sure level (lev-1) boundary conditions are filled
1147  // before we interpolate to level (lev) ghost cells
1148  //
1149  if (lev < finest_level) {
1150  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
1151  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::cons],0,0,lev_old[Vars::cons].nComp(),lev_old[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());
1152  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],0,0,lev_old[Vars::xvel].nComp(),lev_old[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
1153  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::yvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,0,lev_old[Vars::yvel].nComp(),lev_old[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
1154  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::zvel],lev_new[Vars::zvel],0,0,lev_old[Vars::zvel].nComp(),lev_old[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
1155  }
1156 
1157  //
1158  // We fill the ghost cell values of the base state in case it wasn't done in the initialization
1159  //
1160  base_state[lev].FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
1161 
1162  // For moving terrain only
1163  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::MovingFittedMesh) {
1164  MultiFab::Copy(base_state_new[lev],base_state[lev],0,0,BaseState::num_comps,base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
1165  base_state_new[lev].FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
1166  }
1167 
1168  }
1169 
1170  // Allow idealized cases over water, used to set lmask
1171  ParmParse pp("erf");
1172  int is_land;
1173  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1174  {
1175  if (pp.query("is_land", is_land, lev)) {
1176  if (is_land == 1) {
1177  amrex::Print() << "Level " << lev << " is land" << std::endl;
1178  } else if (is_land == 0) {
1179  amrex::Print() << "Level " << lev << " is water" << std::endl;
1180  } else {
1181  Error("is_land should be 0 or 1");
1182  }
1183  lmask_lev[lev][0]->setVal(is_land);
1184  lmask_lev[lev][0]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
1185  }
1186  }
1187 
1188 #ifdef ERF_USE_WW3_COUPLING
1189  int my_lev = 0;
1190  amrex::Print() << " About to call send_to_ww3 from ERF.cpp" << std::endl;
1191  send_to_ww3(my_lev);
1192  amrex::Print() << " About to call read_waves from ERF.cpp" << std::endl;
1193  read_waves(my_lev);
1194  // send_to_ww3(my_lev);
1195 #endif
1196 
1197  // Configure SurfaceLayer params if used
1198  // NOTE: we must set up the MOST routine after calling FillPatch
1199  // in order to have lateral ghost cells filled (MOST + terrain interp).
1200  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::surface_layer)
1201  {
1202  bool rotate = solverChoice.use_rotate_surface_flux;
1203  if (rotate) {
1204  Print() << "Using surface layer model with stress rotations" << std::endl;
1205  }
1206 
1207  //
1208  // This constructor will make the ABLMost object but not allocate the arrays at each level.
1209  //
1210  m_SurfaceLayer = std::make_unique<SurfaceLayer>(geom, rotate, pp_prefix, Qv_prim,
1211  z_phys_nd, solverChoice.terrain_type
1212 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1213  ,start_bdy_time, bdy_time_interval
1214 #endif
1215  );
1216  // This call will allocate the arrays at each level. If we regrid later, either changing
1217  // the number of level sor just the grids at each existing level, we will call an update routine
1218  // to redefine the internal arrays in m_SurfaceLayer.
1219  int nlevs = geom.size();
1220  for (int lev = 0; lev < nlevs; lev++)
1221  {
1222  Vector<MultiFab*> mfv_old = {&vars_old[lev][Vars::cons], &vars_old[lev][Vars::xvel],
1223  &vars_old[lev][Vars::yvel], &vars_old[lev][Vars::zvel]};
1224  m_SurfaceLayer->make_SurfaceLayer_at_level(lev,nlevs,
1225  mfv_old, Theta_prim[lev], Qv_prim[lev],
1226  Qr_prim[lev], z_phys_nd[lev],
1227  Hwave[lev].get(),Lwave[lev].get(),eddyDiffs_lev[lev].get(),
1228  lsm_data[lev], lsm_flux[lev], sst_lev[lev],
1229  tsk_lev[lev], lmask_lev[lev]);
1230  }
1231 
1232 
1233  if (restart_chkfile != "") {
1234  // Update surface fields if needed (and available)
1235  ReadCheckpointFileSurfaceLayer();
1236  }
1237 
1238  // We now configure ABLMost params here so that we can print the averages at t=0
1239  // Note we don't fill ghost cells here because this is just for diagnostics
1240  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
1241  {
1242  Real time = t_new[lev];
1243  IntVect ng = Theta_prim[lev]->nGrowVect();
1244 
1245  MultiFab::Copy( *Theta_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoTheta_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1246  MultiFab::Divide(*Theta_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1247 
1248  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None) {
1249  ng = Qv_prim[lev]->nGrowVect();
1250 
1251  MultiFab::Copy( *Qv_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ1_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1252  MultiFab::Divide(*Qv_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1253 
1254  int rhoqr_comp = solverChoice.RhoQr_comp;
1255  if (rhoqr_comp > -1) {
1256  MultiFab::Copy( *Qr_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], rhoqr_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1257  MultiFab::Divide(*Qr_prim[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, 0, 1, ng);
1258  } else {
1259  Qr_prim[lev]->setVal(0.0);
1260  }
1261  }
1262  m_SurfaceLayer->update_mac_ptrs(lev, vars_new, Theta_prim, Qv_prim, Qr_prim);
1263 
1264  if (restart_chkfile == "") {
1265  // Only do this if starting from scratch; if restarting, then
1266  // we don't want to call update_fluxes multiple times because
1267  // it will change u* and theta* from their previous values
1268  m_SurfaceLayer->update_pblh(lev, vars_new, z_phys_cc[lev].get(),
1269  solverChoice.RhoQv_comp,
1270  solverChoice.RhoQc_comp,
1271  solverChoice.RhoQr_comp);
1272  m_SurfaceLayer->update_fluxes(lev, time);
1273  }
1274  }
1275  } // end if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::surface_layer)
1276 
1277  // Update micro vars before first plot file
1278  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None) {
1279  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) micro->Update_Micro_Vars_Lev(lev, vars_new[lev][Vars::cons]);
1280  }
1281 
1282  // Fill time averaged velocities before first plot file
1283  if (solverChoice.time_avg_vel) {
1284  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1285  Time_Avg_Vel_atCC(dt[lev], t_avg_cnt[lev], vel_t_avg[lev].get(),
1286  vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],
1287  vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],
1288  vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]);
1289  }
1290  }
1291 
1292  // check for additional plotting variables that are available after particle containers
1293  // are setup.
1294  const std::string& pv1 = "plot_vars_1"; appendPlotVariables(pv1,plot_var_names_1);
1295  const std::string& pv2 = "plot_vars_2"; appendPlotVariables(pv2,plot_var_names_2);
1296 
1297  if ( restart_chkfile.empty() && (m_check_int > 0 || m_check_per > 0.) )
1298  {
1299  WriteCheckpointFile();
1300  last_check_file_step = 0;
1301  }
1302 
1303  if ( (restart_chkfile.empty()) ||
1304  (!restart_chkfile.empty() && plot_file_on_restart) )
1305  {
1306  if (m_plot_int_1 > 0 || m_plot_per_1 > 0.)
1307  {
1308  WritePlotFile(1,plotfile_type_1,plot_var_names_1);
1309  last_plot_file_step_1 = istep[0];
1310  }
1311  if (m_plot_int_2 > 0 || m_plot_per_2 > 0.)
1312  {
1313  WritePlotFile(2,plotfile_type_2,plot_var_names_2);
1314  last_plot_file_step_2 = istep[0];
1315  }
1316  if (m_subvol_int > 0 || m_subvol_per > 0.) {
1317  WriteSubvolume();
1318  last_subvol = istep[0];
1319  }
1320  }
1321 
1322  // Set these up here because we need to know which MPI rank "cell" is on...
1323  if (pp.contains("data_log"))
1324  {
1325  int num_datalogs = pp.countval("data_log");
1326  datalog.resize(num_datalogs);
1327  datalogname.resize(num_datalogs);
1328  pp.queryarr("data_log",datalogname,0,num_datalogs);
1329  for (int i = 0; i < num_datalogs; i++) {
1330  setRecordDataInfo(i,datalogname[i]);
1331  }
1332  }
1333 
1334  if (pp.contains("der_data_log"))
1335  {
1336  int num_der_datalogs = pp.countval("der_data_log");
1337  der_datalog.resize(num_der_datalogs);
1338  der_datalogname.resize(num_der_datalogs);
1339  pp.queryarr("der_data_log",der_datalogname,0,num_der_datalogs);
1340  for (int i = 0; i < num_der_datalogs; i++) {
1341  setRecordDerDataInfo(i,der_datalogname[i]);
1342  }
1343  }
1344 
1345  if (pp.contains("energy_data_log"))
1346  {
1347  int num_energy_datalogs = pp.countval("energy_data_log");
1348  tot_e_datalog.resize(num_energy_datalogs);
1349  tot_e_datalogname.resize(num_energy_datalogs);
1350  pp.queryarr("energy_data_log",tot_e_datalogname,0,num_energy_datalogs);
1351  for (int i = 0; i < num_energy_datalogs; i++) {
1352  setRecordEnergyDataInfo(i,tot_e_datalogname[i]);
1353  }
1354  }
1355 
1356  if (solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None)
1357  {
1358  // Create data log for radiation model if requested
1359  rad[0]->setupDataLog();
1360  }
1361 
1362 
1363  if (restart_chkfile.empty() && profile_int > 0) {
1364  if (destag_profiles) {
1365  // all variables cell-centered
1366  write_1D_profiles(t_new[0]);
1367  } else {
1368  // some variables staggered
1369  write_1D_profiles_stag(t_new[0]);
1370  }
1371  }
1372 
1373  if (pp.contains("sample_point_log") && pp.contains("sample_point"))
1374  {
1375  int lev = 0;
1376 
1377  int num_samplepts = pp.countval("sample_point") / AMREX_SPACEDIM;
1378  if (num_samplepts > 0) {
1379  Vector<int> index; index.resize(num_samplepts*AMREX_SPACEDIM);
1380  samplepoint.resize(num_samplepts);
1381 
1382  pp.queryarr("sample_point",index,0,num_samplepts*AMREX_SPACEDIM);
1383  for (int i = 0; i < num_samplepts; i++) {
1384  IntVect iv(index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+0],index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+1],index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+2]);
1385  samplepoint[i] = iv;
1386  }
1387  }
1388 
1389  int num_sampleptlogs = pp.countval("sample_point_log");
1390  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(num_sampleptlogs == num_samplepts);
1391  if (num_sampleptlogs > 0) {
1392  sampleptlog.resize(num_sampleptlogs);
1393  sampleptlogname.resize(num_sampleptlogs);
1394  pp.queryarr("sample_point_log",sampleptlogname,0,num_sampleptlogs);
1395 
1396  for (int i = 0; i < num_sampleptlogs; i++) {
1397  setRecordSamplePointInfo(i,lev,samplepoint[i],sampleptlogname[i]);
1398  }
1399  }
1400 
1401  }
1402 
1403  if (pp.contains("sample_line_log") && pp.contains("sample_line"))
1404  {
1405  int lev = 0;
1406 
1407  int num_samplelines = pp.countval("sample_line") / AMREX_SPACEDIM;
1408  if (num_samplelines > 0) {
1409  Vector<int> index; index.resize(num_samplelines*AMREX_SPACEDIM);
1410  sampleline.resize(num_samplelines);
1411 
1412  pp.queryarr("sample_line",index,0,num_samplelines*AMREX_SPACEDIM);
1413  for (int i = 0; i < num_samplelines; i++) {
1414  IntVect iv(index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+0],index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+1],index[AMREX_SPACEDIM*i+2]);
1415  sampleline[i] = iv;
1416  }
1417  }
1418 
1419  int num_samplelinelogs = pp.countval("sample_line_log");
1420  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(num_samplelinelogs == num_samplelines);
1421  if (num_samplelinelogs > 0) {
1422  samplelinelog.resize(num_samplelinelogs);
1423  samplelinelogname.resize(num_samplelinelogs);
1424  pp.queryarr("sample_line_log",samplelinelogname,0,num_samplelinelogs);
1425 
1426  for (int i = 0; i < num_samplelinelogs; i++) {
1427  setRecordSampleLineInfo(i,lev,sampleline[i],samplelinelogname[i]);
1428  }
1429  }
1430 
1431  }
1432 
1433  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], t_new[0], dt[0], sum_interval, sum_per)) {
1434  sum_integrated_quantities(t_new[0]);
1435  sum_derived_quantities(t_new[0]);
1436  sum_energy_quantities(t_new[0]);
1437  }
1438 
1439  // Create object to do line and plane sampling if needed
1440  bool do_line = false; bool do_plane = false;
1441  pp.query("do_line_sampling",do_line); pp.query("do_plane_sampling",do_plane);
1442  if (do_line || do_plane) { data_sampler = std::make_unique<SampleData>(do_line, do_plane); }
1443 
1444  if ( solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB ||
1445  solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing)
1446  {
1447  bool write_eb_surface = false;
1448  pp.query("write_eb_surface", write_eb_surface);
1449  if (write_eb_surface) WriteMyEBSurface();
1450  }
1451 
1452 }
MolecDiffType::ConstantAlpha
@ ConstantAlpha

◆ InitData_pre()

void ERF::InitData_pre ( )
732 {
733  // Initialize the start time for our CPU-time tracker
734  startCPUTime = ParallelDescriptor::second();
735 
736  // Create the ReadBndryPlanes object so we can read boundary plane data
737  // m_r2d is used by init_bcs so we must instantiate this class before
738  if (input_bndry_planes) {
739  Print() << "Defining r2d for the first time " << std::endl;
740  m_r2d = std::make_unique<ReadBndryPlanes>(geom[0], solverChoice.rdOcp);
741  }
742 
743  last_plot_file_step_1 = -1;
744  last_plot_file_step_2 = -1;
745  last_check_file_step = -1;
746 
747  if (restart_chkfile.empty()) {
748  // start simulation from the beginning
749 
750  const Real time = start_time;
751  InitFromScratch(time);
752  } else {
753  // For initialization this is done in init_only; it is done here for restart
754  init_bcs();
755  }
756 
757  // Verify solver choices
758  for (int lev(0); lev <= max_level; ++lev) {
759  // BC compatibility
760  if ( ( (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].pbl_type == PBLType::MYNN25) ||
761  (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].pbl_type == PBLType::MYNNEDMF) ||
762  (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].pbl_type == PBLType::YSU) ||
763  (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].pbl_type == PBLType::MRF)
764  ) &&
765  phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::surface_layer ) {
766  Abort("MYNN2.5/MYNNEDMF/YSU/MRF PBL Model requires MOST at lower boundary");
767  }
768  if ( (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].les_type == LESType::Deardorff) &&
769  (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].Ce_wall > 0) &&
770  (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::surface_layer) &&
771  (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::slip_wall) &&
772  (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::no_slip_wall) )
773  {
774  Warning("Deardorff LES assumes wall at zlo when applying Ce_wall");
775  }
776 
777  if ( (solverChoice.const_massflux_u != 0) &&
778  (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::x,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::periodic ) )
779  {
780  Abort("Constant mass flux (in x) should be used with periodic boundaries");
781  }
782  if ( (solverChoice.const_massflux_v != 0) &&
783  (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::y,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::periodic ) )
784  {
785  Abort("Constant mass flux (in y) should be used with periodic boundaries");
786  }
787 
788  // mesoscale diffusion
789  if ((geom[lev].CellSize(0) > 2000.) || (geom[lev].CellSize(1) > 2000.))
790  {
791  if ( (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].les_type == LESType::Smagorinsky) &&
792  (!solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].smag2d)) {
793  Warning("Should use 2-D Smagorinsky for mesoscale resolution");
794  } else if (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].les_type == LESType::Deardorff) {
795  Warning("Should not use Deardorff LES for mesoscale resolution");
796  }
797  }
798  }
799 }

143 {

◆ initHSE() [2/2]

void ERF::initHSE ( int  lev)
private

Initialize density and pressure base state in hydrostatic equilibrium.

21 {
22  // This integrates up through column to update p_hse, pi_hse, th_hse;
23  // r_hse is not const b/c FillBoundary is called at the end for r_hse and p_hse
24 
25  MultiFab r_hse (base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::r0_comp, 1);
26  MultiFab p_hse (base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::p0_comp, 1);
27  MultiFab pi_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::pi0_comp, 1);
28  MultiFab th_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::th0_comp, 1);
29  MultiFab qv_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::qv0_comp, 1);
30 
31  bool all_boxes_touch_bottom = true;
32  Box domain(geom[lev].Domain());
33 
34  int icomp = 0; int ncomp = BaseState::num_comps;
35 
36  if (lev == 0) {
37  BoxArray ba(base_state[lev].boxArray());
38  for (int i = 0; i < ba.size(); i++) {
39  if (ba[i].smallEnd(2) != domain.smallEnd(2)) {
40  all_boxes_touch_bottom = false;
41  }
42  }
43  }
44  else
45  {
46  //
47  // We need to do this interp from coarse level in order to set the values of
48  // the base state inside the domain but outside of the fine region
49  //
50  base_state[lev-1].FillBoundary(geom[lev-1].periodicity());
51  //
52  // NOTE: this interpolater assumes that ALL ghost cells of the coarse MultiFab
53  // have been pre-filled - this includes ghost cells both inside and outside
54  // the domain
55  //
56  InterpFromCoarseLevel(base_state[lev], base_state[lev].nGrowVect(),
57  IntVect(0,0,0), // do not fill ghost cells outside the domain
58  base_state[lev-1], icomp, icomp, ncomp,
59  geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
60  refRatio(lev-1), &cell_cons_interp,
61  domain_bcs_type, BCVars::cons_bc);
62 
63  // We need to do this here because the interpolation above may leave corners unfilled
64  // when the corners need to be filled by, for example, reflection of the fine ghost
65  // cell outside the fine region but inide the domain.
66  (*physbcs_base[lev])(base_state[lev],icomp,ncomp,base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
67  }
68 
69  if (all_boxes_touch_bottom || lev > 0) {
70 
71  // Initial r_hse may or may not be in HSE -- defined in ERF_Prob.cpp
72  if (solverChoice.use_moist_background){
73  prob->erf_init_dens_hse_moist(r_hse, z_phys_nd[lev], geom[lev]);
74  } else {
75  prob->erf_init_dens_hse(r_hse, z_phys_nd[lev], z_phys_cc[lev], geom[lev]);
76  }
77 
78  erf_enforce_hse(lev, r_hse, p_hse, pi_hse, th_hse, qv_hse, z_phys_cc[lev]);
79 
80  //
81  // Impose physical bc's on the base state
82  //
83  (*physbcs_base[lev])(base_state[lev],0,base_state[lev].nComp(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
84 
85  } else {
86 
87  BoxArray ba_new(domain);
88 
89  ChopGrids2D(ba_new, domain, ParallelDescriptor::NProcs());
90 
91  DistributionMapping dm_new(ba_new);
92 
93  MultiFab new_base_state(ba_new, dm_new, BaseState::num_comps, base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
94  new_base_state.ParallelCopy(base_state[lev],0,0,base_state[lev].nComp(),
95  base_state[lev].nGrowVect(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
96 
97  MultiFab new_r_hse (new_base_state, make_alias, BaseState::r0_comp, 1);
98  MultiFab new_p_hse (new_base_state, make_alias, BaseState::p0_comp, 1);
99  MultiFab new_pi_hse(new_base_state, make_alias, BaseState::pi0_comp, 1);
100  MultiFab new_th_hse(new_base_state, make_alias, BaseState::th0_comp, 1);
101  MultiFab new_qv_hse(new_base_state, make_alias, BaseState::qv0_comp, 1);
102 
103  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab> new_z_phys_cc;
104  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab> new_z_phys_nd;
105  if (solverChoice.mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
106  new_z_phys_cc = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_new,dm_new,1,1);
107  new_z_phys_cc->ParallelCopy(*z_phys_cc[lev],0,0,1,1,1);
108 
109  BoxArray ba_new_nd(ba_new);
110  ba_new_nd.surroundingNodes();
111  new_z_phys_nd = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(ba_new_nd,dm_new,1,1);
112  new_z_phys_nd->ParallelCopy(*z_phys_nd[lev],0,0,1,1,1);
113  }
114 
115  // Initial r_hse may or may not be in HSE -- defined in ERF_Prob.cpp
116  if (solverChoice.use_moist_background){
117  prob->erf_init_dens_hse_moist(new_r_hse, new_z_phys_nd, geom[lev]);
118  } else {
119  prob->erf_init_dens_hse(new_r_hse, new_z_phys_nd, new_z_phys_cc, geom[lev]);
120  }
121 
122  erf_enforce_hse(lev, new_r_hse, new_p_hse, new_pi_hse, new_th_hse, new_qv_hse, new_z_phys_cc);
123 
124  //
125  // Impose physical bc's on the base state
126  //
127  (*physbcs_base[lev])(new_base_state,0,new_base_state.nComp(),new_base_state.nGrowVect());
128 
129  // Now copy back into the original arrays
130  base_state[lev].ParallelCopy(new_base_state,0,0,base_state[lev].nComp(),
131  base_state[lev].nGrowVect(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
132  }
133 
134  //
135  // Impose physical bc's on the base state -- the values outside the fine region
136  // but inside the domain have already been filled in the call above to InterpFromCoarseLevel
137  //
138  (*physbcs_base[lev])(base_state[lev],0,base_state[lev].nComp(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
139 }
ChopGrids2D
void ChopGrids2D(BoxArray &ba, const Box &domain, int target_size)
Definition: ERF_ChopGrids.cpp:21
ERF::erf_enforce_hse
void erf_enforce_hse(int lev, amrex::MultiFab &dens, amrex::MultiFab &pres, amrex::MultiFab &pi, amrex::MultiFab &th, amrex::MultiFab &qv, std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &z_cc)
Definition: ERF_Init1D.cpp:161
SolverChoice::use_moist_background
bool use_moist_background
Definition: ERF_DataStruct.H:822
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ initialize_integrator()

void ERF::initialize_integrator ( int  lev,
amrex::MultiFab &  cons_mf,
amrex::MultiFab &  vel_mf 
)
private
631 {
632  const BoxArray& ba(cons_mf.boxArray());
633  const DistributionMapping& dm(cons_mf.DistributionMap());
634 
635  int ncomp_cons = cons_mf.nComp();
636 
637  // Initialize the integrator memory
638  Vector<MultiFab> int_state; // integration state data structure example
639  int_state.push_back(MultiFab(cons_mf, make_alias, 0, ncomp_cons)); // cons
640  int_state.push_back(MultiFab(convert(ba,IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, vel_mf.nGrow())); // xmom
641  int_state.push_back(MultiFab(convert(ba,IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, vel_mf.nGrow())); // ymom
642  int_state.push_back(MultiFab(convert(ba,IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, vel_mf.nGrow())); // zmom
643 
644  mri_integrator_mem[lev] = std::make_unique<MRISplitIntegrator<Vector<MultiFab> > >(int_state);
645  mri_integrator_mem[lev]->setNoSubstepping((solverChoice.substepping_type[lev] == SubsteppingType::None));
646  mri_integrator_mem[lev]->setAnelastic(solverChoice.anelastic[lev]);
647  mri_integrator_mem[lev]->setNcompCons(ncomp_cons);
648  mri_integrator_mem[lev]->setForceFirstStageSingleSubstep(solverChoice.force_stage1_single_substep);
649 }

◆ initializeMicrophysics()

void ERF::initializeMicrophysics ( const int &  a_nlevsmax)
private
Parameters
a_nlevsmaxnumber of AMR levels
1457 {
1458  if (Microphysics::modelType(solverChoice.moisture_type) == MoistureModelType::Eulerian) {
1459 
1460  micro = std::make_unique<EulerianMicrophysics>(a_nlevsmax, solverChoice.moisture_type);
1461 
1462  } else if (Microphysics::modelType(solverChoice.moisture_type) == MoistureModelType::Lagrangian) {
1463 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
1464 
1465  micro = std::make_unique<LagrangianMicrophysics>(a_nlevsmax, solverChoice.moisture_type);
1466  /* Lagrangian microphysics models will have a particle container; it needs to be added
1467  to ERF::particleData */
1468  const auto& pc_name( dynamic_cast<LagrangianMicrophysics&>(*micro).getName() );
1469  /* The particle container has not yet been constructed and initialized, so just add
1470  its name here for now (so that functions to set plotting variables can see it). */
1471  particleData.addName( pc_name );
1472 
1473 #else
1474  Abort("Lagrangian microphysics can be used when compiled with ERF_USE_PARTICLES");
1475 #endif
1476  }
1477 
1478  qmoist.resize(a_nlevsmax);
1479  return;
1480 }
ERF::qmoist

◆ initRayleigh()

void ERF::initRayleigh ( )
private

Initialize Rayleigh damping profiles.

Initialization function for host and device vectors used to store averaged quantities when calculating the effects of Rayleigh Damping.

16  const int khi = geom[0].Domain().bigEnd(2);
17  solverChoice.rayleigh_ztop = (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::None) ? geom[0].ProbHi(2) : zlevels_stag[0][khi+1];
18 
19  h_rayleigh_ptrs.resize(max_level+1);
20  d_rayleigh_ptrs.resize(max_level+1);
21 
22  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
23  {
24  // These have 4 components: ubar, vbar, wbar, thetabar
25  h_rayleigh_ptrs[lev].resize(Rayleigh::nvars);
26  d_rayleigh_ptrs[lev].resize(Rayleigh::nvars);
27

29

32  h_rayleigh_ptrs[lev][n].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
33  d_rayleigh_ptrs[lev][n].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
34  }

38

41  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_ptrs[lev][n].begin(), h_rayleigh_ptrs[lev][n].end(),
42  d_rayleigh_ptrs[lev][n].begin());
43  }
44  }

void ERF::input_sponge ( int  lev)

High level wrapper for sponge x and y velocities level data from input sponge data.

◆ is_it_time_for_action()

bool ERF::is_it_time_for_action ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt,
int  action_interval,
amrex::Real  action_per 
)
static

Helper function which uses the current step number, time, and timestep to determine whether it is time to take an action specified at every interval of timesteps.

Parameters
nstepTimestep number
timeCurrent time
dtlevTimestep for the current level
action_intervalInterval in number of timesteps for taking action
action_perInterval in simulation time for taking action
759 {
760  bool int_test = (action_interval > 0 && nstep % action_interval == 0);
761 
762  bool per_test = false;
763  if (action_per > 0.0) {
764  const int num_per_old = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time - dtlev) / action_per));
765  const int num_per_new = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time) / action_per));
766 
767  if (num_per_old != num_per_new) {
768  per_test = true;
769  }
770  }
771 
772  return int_test || per_test;
773 }

◆ make_physbcs()

void ERF::make_physbcs ( int  lev)
private
653 {
654  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz) {
655  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(z_phys_nd[lev] != nullptr);
656  }
657 
658  physbcs_cons[lev] = std::make_unique<ERFPhysBCFunct_cons> (lev, geom[lev], domain_bcs_type, domain_bcs_type_d,
659  m_bc_extdir_vals, m_bc_neumann_vals,
660  z_phys_nd[lev], solverChoice.use_real_bcs, th_bc_data[lev].data());

◆ MakeDiagnosticAverage()

void ERF::MakeDiagnosticAverage ( amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  h_havg,
amrex::MultiFab &  S,
int  n 
)
2136 {
2137  // Get the number of cells in z at level 0
2138  int dir_z = AMREX_SPACEDIM-1;
2139  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
2140  int size_z = domain.length(dir_z);
2141  int start_z = domain.smallEnd()[dir_z];
2142  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
2143 
2144  // resize the level 0 horizontal average vectors
2145  h_havg.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2146 
2147  // Get the cell centered data and construct sums
2148 #ifdef _OPENMP
2149 #pragma omp parallel if (Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
2150 #endif
2151  for (MFIter mfi(S); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
2152  const Box& box = mfi.validbox();
2153  const IntVect& se = box.smallEnd();
2154  const IntVect& be = box.bigEnd();
2155 
2156  auto fab_arr = S[mfi].array();
2157 
2158  FArrayBox fab_reduce(box, 1, The_Async_Arena());
2159  auto arr_reduce = fab_reduce.array();
2160 
2161  ParallelFor(box, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
2162  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 0) = fab_arr(i,j,k,n);
2163  });
2164 
2165  for (int k=se[dir_z]; k <= be[dir_z]; ++k) {
2166  Box kbox(box); kbox.setSmall(dir_z,k); kbox.setBig(dir_z,k);
2167  h_havg[k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,0);
2168  }
2169  }
2170 
2171  // combine sums from different MPI ranks
2172  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg.dataPtr(), h_havg.size());
2173 
2174  // divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
2175  for (int k = 0; k < size_z; ++k) {
2176  h_havg[k] /= area_z;
2177  }
2178 }

◆ MakeEBGeometry()

void ERF::MakeEBGeometry ( )

◆ MakeHorizontalAverages()

void ERF::MakeHorizontalAverages ( )
2030 {
2031  int lev = 0;
2032 
2033  // First, average down all levels (if doing two-way coupling)
2034  if (solverChoice.coupling_type == CouplingType::TwoWay) {
2035  AverageDown();
2036  }
2037 
2038  MultiFab mf(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 5, 0);
2039 
2040  int zdir = 2;
2041  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
2042 
2043  bool use_moisture = (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None);
2044  bool is_anelastic = (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1);
2045 
2046  for (MFIter mfi(mf); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
2047  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
2048  auto fab_arr = mf.array(mfi);
2049  auto const hse_arr = base_state[lev].const_array(mfi);
2050  auto const cons_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
2051  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
2052  Real dens = cons_arr(i, j, k, Rho_comp);
2053  fab_arr(i, j, k, 0) = dens;
2054  fab_arr(i, j, k, 1) = cons_arr(i, j, k, RhoTheta_comp) / dens;
2055  if (!use_moisture) {
2056  if (is_anelastic) {
2057  fab_arr(i,j,k,2) = hse_arr(i,j,k,BaseState::p0_comp);
2058  } else {
2059  fab_arr(i,j,k,2) = getPgivenRTh(cons_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp));
2060  }
2061  }
2062  });
2063  }
2064 
2065  if (use_moisture)
2066  {
2067  for (MFIter mfi(mf); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
2068  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
2069  auto fab_arr = mf.array(mfi);
2070  auto const hse_arr = base_state[lev].const_array(mfi);
2071  auto const cons_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
2072  int ncomp = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].nComp();
2073 
2074  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
2075  Real dens = cons_arr(i, j, k, Rho_comp);
2076  if (is_anelastic) {
2077  fab_arr(i,j,k,2) = hse_arr(i,j,k,BaseState::p0_comp);
2078  } else {
2079  Real qv = cons_arr(i, j, k, RhoQ1_comp) / dens;
2080  fab_arr(i, j, k, 2) = getPgivenRTh(cons_arr(i, j, k, RhoTheta_comp), qv);
2081  }
2082  fab_arr(i, j, k, 3) = (ncomp > RhoQ1_comp ? cons_arr(i, j, k, RhoQ1_comp) / dens : 0.0);
2083  fab_arr(i, j, k, 4) = (ncomp > RhoQ2_comp ? cons_arr(i, j, k, RhoQ2_comp) / dens : 0.0);
2084  });
2085  }
2086 
2087  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_qv = sumToLine(mf,3,1,domain,zdir);
2088  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_qc = sumToLine(mf,4,1,domain,zdir);
2089  }
2090 
2091  // Sum in the horizontal plane
2092  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_density = sumToLine(mf,0,1,domain,zdir);
2093  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_temperature = sumToLine(mf,1,1,domain,zdir);
2094  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_pressure = sumToLine(mf,2,1,domain,zdir);
2095 
2096  // Divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
2097  int size_z = domain.length(zdir);
2098  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
2099  int klen = static_cast<int>(h_avg_density.size());
2100 
2101  for (int k = 0; k < klen; ++k) {
2102  h_havg_density[k] /= area_z;
2103  h_havg_temperature[k] /= area_z;
2104  h_havg_pressure[k] /= area_z;
2105  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None)
2106  {
2107  h_havg_qc[k] /= area_z;
2108  h_havg_qv[k] /= area_z;
2109  }
2110  } // k
2111 
2112  // resize device vectors
2113  d_havg_density.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2114  d_havg_temperature.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2115  d_havg_pressure.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2116 
2117  // copy host vectors to device vectors
2118  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_density.begin(), h_havg_density.end(), d_havg_density.begin());
2119  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_temperature.begin(), h_havg_temperature.end(), d_havg_temperature.begin());
2120  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_pressure.begin(), h_havg_pressure.end(), d_havg_pressure.begin());
2121 
2122  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None)
2123  {
2124  d_havg_qv.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2125  d_havg_qc.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
2126  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qv.begin(), h_havg_qv.end(), d_havg_qv.begin());
2127  Gpu::copy(Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qc.begin(), h_havg_qc.end(), d_havg_qc.begin());
2128  }
2129 }
