◆ MakeNewLevelFromCoarse()

void ERF::MakeNewLevelFromCoarse ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
override
260 {
261  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(lev > 0);
262 
263  if (verbose) {
264  amrex::Print() <<" NEW BA FROM COARSE AT LEVEL " << lev << " " << ba << std::endl;
265  }
266 
267  //********************************************************************************************
268  // This allocates all kinds of things, including but not limited to: solution arrays,
269  // terrain arrays, metric terms and base state.
270  // *******************************************************************************************
271  init_stuff(lev, ba, dm, vars_new[lev], vars_old[lev], base_state[lev], z_phys_nd[lev]);
272 
273  t_new[lev] = time;
274  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
275 
276  // ********************************************************************************************
277  // Build the data structures for metric quantities used with terrain-fitted coordinates
278  // ********************************************************************************************
279  if ( solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB ||
280  solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing)
281  {
282  const amrex::EB2::IndexSpace& ebis = amrex::EB2::IndexSpace::top();
283  const EB2::Level& eb_level = ebis.getLevel(geom[lev]);
284  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB) {
285  eb[lev]->make_all_factories(lev, geom[lev], ba, dm, eb_level);
286  } else if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing) {
287  eb[lev]->make_cc_factory(lev, geom[lev], ba, dm, eb_level);
288  }
289  }
290  init_zphys(lev, time);
291  update_terrain_arrays(lev);
292 
293  //
294  // Make sure that detJ and z_phys_cc are the average of the data on a finer level if there is one
295  //
296  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
297  for (int crse_lev = lev-1; crse_lev >= 0; crse_lev--) {
298  average_down( *detJ_cc[crse_lev+1], *detJ_cc[crse_lev], 0, 1, refRatio(crse_lev));
299  average_down(*z_phys_cc[crse_lev+1], *z_phys_cc[crse_lev], 0, 1, refRatio(crse_lev));
300  }
301  }
302 
303  // ********************************************************************************************
304  // Build the data structures for canopy model (depends upon z_phys)
305  // ********************************************************************************************
306  if (solverChoice.do_forest_drag) {
307  m_forest_drag[lev]->define_drag_field(ba, dm, geom[lev], z_phys_cc[lev].get(), z_phys_nd[lev].get());
308  }
309 
310  //********************************************************************************************
311  // Microphysics
312  // *******************************************************************************************
313  int q_size = micro->Get_Qmoist_Size(lev);
314  qmoist[lev].resize(q_size);
315  micro->Define(lev, solverChoice);
316  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None)
317  {
318  micro->Init(lev, vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
319  grids[lev], Geom(lev), 0.0,
320  z_phys_nd[lev], detJ_cc[lev]); // dummy dt value
321  }
322  for (int mvar(0); mvar<qmoist[lev].size(); ++mvar) {
323  qmoist[lev][mvar] = micro->Get_Qmoist_Ptr(lev,mvar);
324  }
325 
326  // *****************************************************************************************************
327  // Initialize the boundary conditions (after initializing the terrain but before calling
328  // initHSE or FillCoarsePatch)
329  // *****************************************************************************************************
330  make_physbcs(lev);
331 
332  // ********************************************************************************************
333  // Update the base state at this level by interpolation from coarser level
334  // ********************************************************************************************
335  InterpFromCoarseLevel(base_state[lev], base_state[lev].nGrowVect(),
336  IntVect(0,0,0), // do not fill ghost cells outside the domain
337  base_state[lev-1], 0, 0, base_state[lev].nComp(),
338  geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
339  refRatio(lev-1), &cell_cons_interp,
340  domain_bcs_type, BCVars::cons_bc);
341 
342  // Impose bc's outside the domain
343  (*physbcs_base[lev])(base_state[lev],0,base_state[lev].nComp(),base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
344 
345  // ********************************************************************************************
346  // Build the data structures for calculating diffusive/turbulent terms
347  // ********************************************************************************************
348  update_diffusive_arrays(lev, ba, dm);
349 
350  // ********************************************************************************************
351  // Fill data at the new level by interpolation from the coarser level
352  // Note that internal to FillCoarsePatch we will convert velocity to momentum,
353  // then interpolate momentum, then convert momentum back to velocity
354  // Also note that FillCoarsePatch is hard-wired to act only on lev_new at coarse and fine
355  // ********************************************************************************************
356  FillCoarsePatch(lev, time);
357 
358  // ********************************************************************************************
359  // Initialize the integrator class
360  // ********************************************************************************************
361  dt_mri_ratio[lev] = dt_mri_ratio[lev-1];
362  initialize_integrator(lev, vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel]);
363 
364  // ********************************************************************************************
365  // If we are making a new level then the FillPatcher for this level hasn't been allocated yet
366  // ********************************************************************************************
367  if (lev > 0 && cf_width >= 0) {
368  Construct_ERFFillPatchers(lev);
369  Define_ERFFillPatchers(lev);
370  }
371 
372  // ********************************************************************************************
373  // Create the SurfaceLayer arrays at this (new) level
374  // ********************************************************************************************
375  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::surface_layer) {
376  int nlevs = finest_level+1;
377  Vector<MultiFab*> mfv_old = {&vars_old[lev][Vars::cons], &vars_old[lev][Vars::xvel],
378  &vars_old[lev][Vars::yvel], &vars_old[lev][Vars::zvel]};
379  m_SurfaceLayer->make_SurfaceLayer_at_level(lev,nlevs,
380  mfv_old, Theta_prim[lev], Qv_prim[lev],
381  Qr_prim[lev], z_phys_nd[lev],
382  Hwave[lev].get(), Lwave[lev].get(), eddyDiffs_lev[lev].get(),
383  lsm_data[lev], lsm_flux[lev], sst_lev[lev], tsk_lev[lev], lmask_lev[lev]);
384  }
385 
386 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
387  // particleData.Redistribute();
388 #endif
389 }
ERF::update_diffusive_arrays
void update_diffusive_arrays(int lev, const amrex::BoxArray &ba, const amrex::DistributionMapping &dm)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewArrays.cpp:424
ERF::initialize_integrator
void initialize_integrator(int lev, amrex::MultiFab &cons_mf, amrex::MultiFab &vel_mf)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewArrays.cpp:630
ERF::update_terrain_arrays
void update_terrain_arrays(int lev)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewArrays.cpp:619
ERF::init_zphys
void init_zphys(int lev, amrex::Real time)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewArrays.cpp:514
ERF::init_stuff
void init_stuff(int lev, const amrex::BoxArray &ba, const amrex::DistributionMapping &dm, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &lev_new, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &lev_old, amrex::MultiFab &tmp_base_state, std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &tmp_zphys_nd)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewArrays.cpp:24
ERF::Define_ERFFillPatchers
void Define_ERFFillPatchers(int lev)
Definition: ERF.cpp:2207

◆ MakeNewLevelFromScratch()

void ERF::MakeNewLevelFromScratch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
override
27 {
28  BoxArray ba;
29  DistributionMapping dm;
30  Box domain(Geom(0).Domain());
31  if (lev == 0 && restart_chkfile.empty() &&
32  (max_grid_size[0][0] >= domain.length(0)) &&
33  (max_grid_size[0][1] >= domain.length(1)) &&
34  ba_in.size() != ParallelDescriptor::NProcs())
35  {
36  // We only decompose in z if max_grid_size_z indicates we should
37  bool decompose_in_z = (max_grid_size[0][2] < domain.length(2));
38 
39  ba = ERFPostProcessBaseGrids(Geom(0).Domain(),decompose_in_z);
40  dm = DistributionMapping(ba);
41  } else {
42  ba = ba_in;
43  dm = dm_in;
44  }
45 
46  // ********************************************************************************************
47  // Define grids[lev] to be ba
48  // ********************************************************************************************
49  SetBoxArray(lev, ba);
50 
51  // ********************************************************************************************
52  // Define dmap[lev] to be dm
53  // ********************************************************************************************
54  SetDistributionMap(lev, dm);
55 
56  if (verbose) {
57  amrex::Print() <<" BA FROM SCRATCH AT LEVEL " << lev << " " << ba << std::endl;
58  }
59 
60  if (lev == 0) init_bcs();
61 
62  if ( solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB ||
63  solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing)
64  {
65  const amrex::EB2::IndexSpace& ebis = amrex::EB2::IndexSpace::top();
66  const EB2::Level& eb_level = ebis.getLevel(geom[lev]);
67  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB) {
68  eb[lev]->make_all_factories(lev, geom[lev], grids[lev], dmap[lev], eb_level);
69  } else if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing) {
70  eb[lev]->make_cc_factory(lev, geom[lev], grids[lev], dmap[lev], eb_level);
71  }
72  } else {
73  // m_factory[lev] = std::make_unique<FabFactory<FArrayBox>>();
74  }
75 
76  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
77  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
78 
79  //********************************************************************************************
80  // This allocates all kinds of things, including but not limited to: solution arrays,
81  // terrain arrays, metric terms and base state.
82  // *******************************************************************************************
83  init_stuff(lev, ba, dm, lev_new, lev_old, base_state[lev], z_phys_nd[lev]);
84 
85  //********************************************************************************************
86  // Land Surface Model
87  // *******************************************************************************************
88  int lsm_size = lsm.Get_Data_Size();
89  lsm_data[lev].resize(lsm_size);
90  lsm_flux[lev].resize(lsm_size);
91  lsm.Define(lev, solverChoice);
92  if (solverChoice.lsm_type != LandSurfaceType::None)
93  {
94  lsm.Init(lev, vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Geom(lev), 0.0); // dummy dt value
95  }
96  for (int mvar(0); mvar<lsm_data[lev].size(); ++mvar) {
97  lsm_data[lev][mvar] = lsm.Get_Data_Ptr(lev,mvar);
98  lsm_flux[lev][mvar] = lsm.Get_Flux_Ptr(lev,mvar);
99  }
100 
101  // ********************************************************************************************
102  // Build the data structures for calculating diffusive/turbulent terms
103  // ********************************************************************************************
104  update_diffusive_arrays(lev, ba, dm);
105 
106  // ********************************************************************************************
107  // Build the data structures for holding sea surface temps and skin temps
108  // ********************************************************************************************
109  sst_lev[lev].resize(1); sst_lev[lev][0] = nullptr;
110  tsk_lev[lev].resize(1); tsk_lev[lev][0] = nullptr;
111 
112  // ********************************************************************************************
113  // Thin immersed body
114  // *******************************************************************************************
115  init_thin_body(lev, ba, dm);
116 
117  // ********************************************************************************************
118  // Initialize the integrator class
119  // ********************************************************************************************
120  initialize_integrator(lev, lev_new[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::xvel]);
121 
122  // ********************************************************************************************
123  // Initialize the data itself
124  // If (init_type == InitType::WRFInput) then we are initializing terrain and the initial data in
125  // the same call so we must call init_only before update_terrain_arrays
126  // If (init_type != InitType::WRFInput) then we want to initialize the terrain before the initial data
127  // since we may need to use the grid information before constructing
128  // initial idealized data
129  // ********************************************************************************************
130  if (restart_chkfile.empty()) {
131  if ( (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::WRFInput) || (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Metgrid) )
132  {
133  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::StaticFittedMesh);
134  init_only(lev, start_time);
135  init_zphys(lev, time);
136  update_terrain_arrays(lev);
137  make_physbcs(lev);
138  } else {
139  init_zphys(lev, time);
140  update_terrain_arrays(lev);
141  // Note that for init_type != InitType::WRFInput and != InitType::Metgrid,
142  // make_physbcs is called inside init_only
143  init_only(lev, start_time);
144  }
145  } else {
146  // if restarting and nudging from input sounding, load the input sounding files
147  if (lev == 0 && solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Input_Sounding && solverChoice.nudging_from_input_sounding)
148  {
149  if (input_sounding_data.input_sounding_file.empty()) {
150  Error("input_sounding file name must be provided via input");
151  }
152 
153  input_sounding_data.resize_arrays();
154 
155  // this will interpolate the input profiles to the nominal height levels
156  // (ranging from 0 to the domain top)
157  for (int n = 0; n < input_sounding_data.n_sounding_files; n++) {
158  input_sounding_data.read_from_file(geom[lev], zlevels_stag[lev], n);
159  }
160 
161  // this will calculate the hydrostatically balanced density and pressure
162  // profiles following WRF ideal.exe
163  if (init_sounding_ideal) input_sounding_data.calc_rho_p(0);
164  }
165 
166  // We re-create terrain_blanking on restart rather than storing it in the checkpoint
167  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing) {
168  int ngrow = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice) + 2;
169  terrain_blanking[lev]->setVal(1.0);
170  MultiFab::Subtract(*terrain_blanking[lev], EBFactory(lev).getVolFrac(), 0, 0, 1, ngrow);
171  terrain_blanking[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
172  }
173  }
174 
175  // Read in tables needed for windfarm simulations
176  // fill in Nturb multifab - number of turbines in each mesh cell
177  // write out the vtk files for wind turbine location and/or
178  // actuator disks
179  #ifdef ERF_USE_WINDFARM
180  init_windfarm(lev);
181  #endif
182 
183  // ********************************************************************************************
184  // Build the data structures for canopy model (depends upon z_phys)
185  // ********************************************************************************************
186  if (restart_chkfile.empty()) {
187  if (solverChoice.do_forest_drag) {
188  m_forest_drag[lev]->define_drag_field(ba, dm, geom[lev], z_phys_cc[lev].get(), z_phys_nd[lev].get());
189  }
190  }
191 
192  //********************************************************************************************
193  // Create wall distance field for RANS model (depends upon z_phys)
194  // *******************************************************************************************
195  if (solverChoice.turbChoice[lev].rans_type != RANSType::None) {
196  // Handle bottom boundary
197  poisson_wall_dist(lev);
198 
199  // Correct the wall distance for immersed bodies
200  if (solverChoice.advChoice.have_zero_flux_faces) {
201  thinbody_wall_dist(walldist[lev],
202  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux,
203  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux,
204  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux,
205  geom[lev],
206  z_phys_cc[lev]);
207  }
208  }
209 
210  //********************************************************************************************
211  // Microphysics
212  // *******************************************************************************************
213  int q_size = micro->Get_Qmoist_Size(lev);
214  qmoist[lev].resize(q_size);
215  micro->Define(lev, solverChoice);
216  if (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None)
217  {
218  micro->Init(lev, vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
219  grids[lev], Geom(lev), 0.0,
220  z_phys_nd[lev], detJ_cc[lev]); // dummy dt value
221  }
222  for (int mvar(0); mvar<qmoist[lev].size(); ++mvar) {
223  qmoist[lev][mvar] = micro->Get_Qmoist_Ptr(lev,mvar);
224  }
225 
226  //********************************************************************************************
227  // Radiation
228  // *******************************************************************************************
229  if (solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None)
230  {
231  rad[lev]->Init(geom[lev], ba, &vars_new[lev][Vars::cons]);
232  }
233 
234  // ********************************************************************************************
235  // If we are making a new level then the FillPatcher for this level hasn't been allocated yet
236  // ********************************************************************************************
237  if (lev > 0 && cf_width >= 0) {
238  Construct_ERFFillPatchers(lev);
239  Define_ERFFillPatchers(lev);
240  }
241 
242 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
243  if (restart_chkfile.empty()) {
244  if (lev == 0) {
245  initializeTracers((ParGDBBase*)GetParGDB(),z_phys_nd);
246  } else {
247  particleData.Redistribute();
248  }
249  }
250 #endif
251 }
ERFPostProcessBaseGrids
BoxArray ERFPostProcessBaseGrids(const Box &domain, bool decompose_in_z)
Definition: ERF_ChopGrids.cpp:6
thinbody_wall_dist
void thinbody_wall_dist(std::unique_ptr< MultiFab > &wdist, Vector< IntVect > &xfaces, Vector< IntVect > &yfaces, Vector< IntVect > &zfaces, const Geometry &geomdata, std::unique_ptr< MultiFab > &z_phys_cc)
Definition: ERF_ThinBodyWallDist.cpp:12
ERF::init_only
void init_only(int lev, amrex::Real time)
Definition: ERF.cpp:1529
ERF::poisson_wall_dist
void poisson_wall_dist(int lev)
Definition: ERF_PoissonWallDist.cpp:20
ERF::init_thin_body
void init_thin_body(int lev, const amrex::BoxArray &ba, const amrex::DistributionMapping &dm)
Definition: ERF_MakeNewLevel.cpp:640
LandSurface::Get_Data_Size
int Get_Data_Size()
Definition: ERF_LandSurface.H:92
LandSurface::Get_Flux_Ptr
amrex::MultiFab * Get_Flux_Ptr(const int &lev, const int &varIdx)
Definition: ERF_LandSurface.H:86
LandSurface::Init
void Init(const int &lev, const amrex::MultiFab &cons_in, const amrex::Geometry &geom, const amrex::Real &dt_advance)
Definition: ERF_LandSurface.H:43
LandSurface::Define
void Define(const int &lev, SolverChoice &sc)
Definition: ERF_LandSurface.H:36
LandSurface::Get_Data_Ptr
amrex::MultiFab * Get_Data_Ptr(const int &lev, const int &varIdx)
Definition: ERF_LandSurface.H:83
SolverChoice::nudging_from_input_sounding
bool nudging_from_input_sounding
Definition: ERF_DataStruct.H:782

◆ MakeVTKFilename()

std::string ERF::MakeVTKFilename ( int  nstep)
574  {
575  // Ensure output directory exists
576  const std::string dir = "Output_HurricaneTracker";
577  if (!fs::exists(dir)) {
578  fs::create_directory(dir);
579  }
580 
581  // Construct filename with zero-padded step
582  std::ostringstream oss;
583  if(nstep==0){
584  oss << dir << "/hurricane_track_" << std::setw(7) << std::setfill('0') << nstep << ".vtk";
585  } else {
586  oss << dir << "/hurricane_track_" << std::setw(7) << std::setfill('0') << nstep+1 << ".vtk";
587  }
588 
589  return oss.str();
590 }

◆ ParameterSanityChecks()

void ERF::ParameterSanityChecks ( )
private
1963 {
1964  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(cfl > 0. || fixed_dt[0] > 0.);
1965 
1966  // We don't allow use_real_bcs to be true if init_type is not either InitType::WRFInput or InitType::Metgrid
1967  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT( !solverChoice.use_real_bcs ||
1968  ((solverChoice.init_type == InitType::WRFInput) || (solverChoice.init_type == InitType::Metgrid)) );
1969 
1970  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(real_width >= 0);
1971  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(real_set_width >= 0);
1972  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(real_width >= real_set_width);
1973 
1974  if (cf_width < 0 || cf_set_width < 0 || cf_width < cf_set_width) {
1975  Abort("You must set cf_width >= cf_set_width >= 0");
1976  }
1977  if (max_level > 0 && cf_set_width > 0) {
1978  for (int lev = 1; lev <= max_level; lev++) {
1979  if (cf_set_width%ref_ratio[lev-1][0] != 0 ||
1980  cf_set_width%ref_ratio[lev-1][1] != 0 ||
1981  cf_set_width%ref_ratio[lev-1][2] != 0 ) {
1982  Abort("You must set cf_width to be a multiple of ref_ratio");
1983  }
1984  }
1985  }
1986 
1987  // If fixed_mri_dt_ratio is set, it must be even
1988  if (fixed_mri_dt_ratio > 0 && (fixed_mri_dt_ratio%2 != 0) )
1989  {
1990  Abort("If you specify fixed_mri_dt_ratio, it must be even");
1991  }
1992 
1993  for (int lev = 0; lev <= max_level; lev++)
1994  {
1995  // We ignore fixed_fast_dt if not substepping
1996  if (solverChoice.substepping_type[lev] == SubsteppingType::None) {
1997  fixed_fast_dt[lev] = -1.0;
1998  }
1999 
2000  // If both fixed_dt and fast_dt are specified, their ratio must be an even integer
2001  if (fixed_dt[lev] > 0. && fixed_fast_dt[lev] > 0. && fixed_mri_dt_ratio <= 0)
2002  {
2003  Real eps = 1.e-12;
2004  int ratio = static_cast<int>( ( (1.0+eps) * fixed_dt[lev] ) / fixed_fast_dt[lev] );
2005  if (fixed_dt[lev] / fixed_fast_dt[lev] != ratio)
2006  {
2007  Abort("Ratio of fixed_dt to fixed_fast_dt must be an even integer");
2008  }
2009  }
2010 
2011  // If all three are specified, they must be consistent
2012  if (fixed_dt[lev] > 0. && fixed_fast_dt[lev] > 0. && fixed_mri_dt_ratio > 0)
2013  {
2014  if (fixed_dt[lev] / fixed_fast_dt[lev] != fixed_mri_dt_ratio)
2015  {
2016  Abort("Dt is over-specfied");
2017  }
2018  }
2019  } // lev
2020 
2021  if (solverChoice.coupling_type == CouplingType::TwoWay && cf_width > 0) {
2022  Abort("For two-way coupling you must set cf_width = 0");
2023  }
2024 }
ERF::real_set_width
int real_set_width
Definition: ERF.H:1051

std::string ERF::PlotFileName ( int  lev) const

Vector< std::string > ERF::PlotFileVarNames ( amrex::Vector< std::string >  plot_var_names)

250 {

◆ poisson_wall_dist()

void ERF::poisson_wall_dist ( int  lev)

Calculate wall distances using the Poisson equation

The zlo boundary is assumed to correspond to the land surface. If there are no boundary walls, then the other use case is to calculate wall distances for immersed boundaries (embedded or thin body).

See Tucker, P. G. (2003). Differential equation-based wall distance computation for DES and RANS. Journal of Computational Physics, 190(1), 229248. https://doi.org/10.1016/S0021-9991(03)00272-9

21 {
22  BL_PROFILE("ERF::poisson_wall_dist()");
23 
24  bool havewall{false};
25  Orientation zlo(Direction::z, Orientation::low);
26  if ( ( phys_bc_type[zlo] == ERF_BC::surface_layer ) ||
27  ( phys_bc_type[zlo] == ERF_BC::no_slip_wall ) )/*||
28  ((phys_bc_type[zlo] == ERF_BC::slip_wall) && (dom_hi.z > dom_lo.z)) )*/
29  {
30  havewall = true;
31  }
32 
33  auto const& geomdata = geom[lev];
34 
35  if (havewall) {
36  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::ConstantDz) {
37 // Comment this out to test the wall dist calc in the trivial case:
38 //#if 0
39  Print() << "Directly calculating direct wall distance for constant dz" << std::endl;
40  const Real* prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
41  const Real* dx = geomdata.CellSize();
42  for (MFIter mfi(*walldist[lev]); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
43  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
44  auto dist_arr = walldist[lev]->array(mfi);
45  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) {
46  dist_arr(i, j, k) = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
47  });
48  }
49  return;
50 //#endif
51  } else if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::StretchedDz) {
52  // TODO: Handle this trivial case
53  Error("Wall dist calc not implemented with grid stretching yet");
54  } else {
55  // TODO
56  Error("Wall dist calc not implemented over terrain yet");
57  }
58  }
59 
60  Print() << "Calculating Poisson wall distance" << std::endl;
61 
62  // Make sure the solver only sees the levels over which we are solving
63  BoxArray nba = walldist[lev]->boxArray();
64  nba.surroundingNodes();
65  Vector<Geometry> geom_tmp; geom_tmp.push_back(geom[lev]);
66  Vector<BoxArray> ba_tmp; ba_tmp.push_back(nba);
67  Vector<DistributionMapping> dm_tmp; dm_tmp.push_back(walldist[lev]->DistributionMap());
68 
69  Vector<MultiFab> rhs;
70  Vector<MultiFab> phi;
71 
72  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB) {
73  amrex::Error("Wall dist calc not implemented for EB");
74  } else {
75  rhs.resize(1); rhs[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
76  phi.resize(1); phi[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 1);
77  }
78 
79  rhs[0].setVal(-1.0);
80 
81  // Define an overset mask to set dirichlet nodes on walls
82  iMultiFab mask(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
83  Vector<const iMultiFab*> overset_mask = {&mask};
84 
85  auto const dom_lo = lbound(geom[lev].Domain());
86  auto const dom_hi = ubound(geom[lev].Domain());
87 
88  // ****************************************************************************
89  // Initialize phi
90  // (It is essential that we do this in order to fill the corners; this is
91  // used if we include blanking.)
92  // ****************************************************************************
93  phi[0].setVal(0.0);
94 
95  // ****************************************************************************
96  // Interior boundaries are marked with phi=0
97  // ****************************************************************************
98  // Overset mask is 0/1: 1 means the node is an unknown. 0 means it's known.
99  mask.setVal(1);
100  if (solverChoice.advChoice.have_zero_flux_faces) {
101  Warning("Poisson distance is inaccurate for bodies in open domains that are small compared to the domain size, skipping");
102  return;
103 #if 0
104  Gpu::DeviceVector<IntVect> xfacelist, yfacelist, zfacelist;
105 
106  xfacelist.resize(solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.size());
107  yfacelist.resize(solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.size());
108  zfacelist.resize(solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.size());
109 
110  if (xfacelist.size() > 0) {
111  Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice,
112  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.begin(),
113  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_xflux.end(),
114  xfacelist.begin());
115  Print() << " masking interior xfaces" << std::endl;
116  }
117  if (yfacelist.size() > 0) {
118  Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice,
119  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.begin(),
120  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_yflux.end(),
121  yfacelist.begin());
122  Print() << " masking interior yfaces" << std::endl;
123  }
124  if (zfacelist.size() > 0) {
125  Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice,
126  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.begin(),
127  solverChoice.advChoice.zero_zflux.end(),
128  zfacelist.begin());
129  Print() << " masking interior zfaces" << std::endl;
130  }
131 
132  for (MFIter mfi(phi[0]); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
133  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
134 
135  auto phi_arr = phi[0].array(mfi);
136  auto mask_arr = mask.array(mfi);
137 
138  if (xfacelist.size() > 0) {
139  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) {
140  for (int iface=0; iface < xfacelist.size(); ++iface) {
141  if ((i == xfacelist[iface][0]) &&
142  (j == xfacelist[iface][1]) &&
143  (k == xfacelist[iface][2]))
144  {
145  mask_arr(i, j , k ) = 0;
146  mask_arr(i, j , k+1) = 0;
147  mask_arr(i, j+1, k ) = 0;
148  mask_arr(i, j+1, k+1) = 0;
149  }
150  }
151  });
152  }
153 
154  if (yfacelist.size() > 0) {
155  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) {
156  for (int iface=0; iface < yfacelist.size(); ++iface) {
157  if ((i == yfacelist[iface][0]) &&
158  (j == yfacelist[iface][1]) &&
159  (k == yfacelist[iface][2]))
160  {
161  mask_arr(i , j, k ) = 0;
162  mask_arr(i , j, k+1) = 0;
163  mask_arr(i+1, j, k ) = 0;
164  mask_arr(i+1, j, k+1) = 0;
165  }
166  }
167  });
168  }
169 
170  if (zfacelist.size() > 0) {
171  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) {
172  for (int iface=0; iface < zfacelist.size(); ++iface) {
173  if ((i == xfacelist[iface][0]) &&
174  (j == xfacelist[iface][1]) &&
175  (k == xfacelist[iface][2]))
176  {
177  mask_arr(i , j , k) = 0;
178  mask_arr(i , j+1, k) = 0;
179  mask_arr(i+1, j , k) = 0;
180  mask_arr(i+1, j+1, k) = 0;
181  }
182  }
183  });
184  }
185  }
186 #endif
187  }
188 
189  // ****************************************************************************
190  // Setup BCs, with solid domain boundaries being dirichlet
191  // ****************************************************************************
192  amrex::Array<amrex::LinOpBCType,AMREX_SPACEDIM> bc3d_lo, bc3d_hi;
193  for (int dir = 0; dir < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++dir) {
194  if (geom[0].isPeriodic(dir)) {
195  bc3d_lo[dir] = LinOpBCType::Periodic;
196  bc3d_hi[dir] = LinOpBCType::Periodic;
197  } else {
198  bc3d_lo[dir] = LinOpBCType::Neumann;
199  bc3d_hi[dir] = LinOpBCType::Neumann;
200  }
201  }
202  if (havewall) {
203  Print() << " Poisson zlo BC is dirichlet" << std::endl;
204  bc3d_lo[2] = LinOpBCType::Dirichlet;
205  }
206  Print() << " bc lo : " << bc3d_lo << std::endl;
207  Print() << " bc hi : " << bc3d_hi << std::endl;
208 
209  if (!solverChoice.advChoice.have_zero_flux_faces && !havewall) {
210  Error("No solid boundaries in the computational domain");
211  }
212 
213  LPInfo info;
214 /* Nodal solver cannot have hidden dimensions */
215 #if 0
216  // Allow a hidden direction if the domain is one cell wide
217  if (dom_lo.x == dom_hi.x) {
218  info.setHiddenDirection(0);
219  Print() << " domain is 2D in yz" << std::endl;
220  } else if (dom_lo.y == dom_hi.y) {
221  info.setHiddenDirection(1);
222  Print() << " domain is 2D in xz" << std::endl;
223  } else if (dom_lo.z == dom_hi.z) {
224  info.setHiddenDirection(2);
225  Print() << " domain is 2D in xy" << std::endl;
226  }
227 #endif
228 
229  // ****************************************************************************
230  // Solve nodal masked Poisson problem with MLMG
231  // TODO: different solver for terrain?
232  // ****************************************************************************
233  const Real reltol = solverChoice.poisson_reltol;
234  const Real abstol = solverChoice.poisson_abstol;
235 
236  Real sigma = 1.0;
237  Vector<EBFArrayBoxFactory const*> factory_vec = { &EBFactory(lev) };
238  MLNodeLaplacian mlpoisson(geom_tmp, ba_tmp, dm_tmp, info, factory_vec, sigma);
239 
240  mlpoisson.setDomainBC(bc3d_lo, bc3d_hi);
241 
242  if (lev > 0) {
243  mlpoisson.setCoarseFineBC(nullptr, ref_ratio[lev-1], LinOpBCType::Neumann);
244  }
245 
246  mlpoisson.setLevelBC(0, nullptr);
247 
248  mlpoisson.setOversetMask(0, mask);
249 
250  // Solve
251  MLMG mlmg(mlpoisson);
252  int max_iter = 100;
253  mlmg.setMaxIter(max_iter);
254 
255  mlmg.setVerbose(mg_verbose);
256  mlmg.setBottomVerbose(0);
257 
258  mlmg.solve(GetVecOfPtrs(phi),
259  GetVecOfConstPtrs(rhs),
260  reltol, abstol);
261 
262  // Now overwrite with periodic fill outside domain and fine-fine fill inside
263  phi[0].FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
264 
265  // ****************************************************************************
266  // Compute grad(phi) to get distances
267  // - Note that phi is nodal and walldist is cell-centered
268  // - TODO: include terrain metrics for dphi/dz
269  // ****************************************************************************
270  for (MFIter mfi(*walldist[lev]); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
271  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
272 
273  const auto invCellSize = geomdata.InvCellSizeArray();
274 
275  auto const& phi_arr = phi[0].const_array(mfi);
276  auto dist_arr = walldist[lev]->array(mfi);
277 
278  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) {
279  Real dpdx{0}, dpdy{0}, dpdz{0};
280 
281  // dphi/dx
282  if (dom_lo.x != dom_hi.x) {
283  dpdx = 0.25 * invCellSize[0] * (
284  (phi_arr(i+1, j , k ) - phi_arr(i, j , k ))
285  + (phi_arr(i+1, j , k+1) - phi_arr(i, j , k+1))
286  + (phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k ) - phi_arr(i, j+1, k ))
287  + (phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k+1) - phi_arr(i, j+1, k+1)) );
288  }
289 
290  // dphi/dy
291  if (dom_lo.y != dom_hi.y) {
292  dpdy = 0.25 * invCellSize[1] * (
293  (phi_arr(i , j+1, k ) - phi_arr(i , j, k ))
294  + (phi_arr(i , j+1, k+1) - phi_arr(i , j, k+1))
295  + (phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k ) - phi_arr(i+1, j, k ))
296  + (phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k+1) - phi_arr(i+1, j, k+1)) );
297  }
298 
299  // dphi/dz
300  if (dom_lo.z != dom_hi.z) {
301  dpdz = 0.25 * invCellSize[2] * (
302  (phi_arr(i , j , k+1) - phi_arr(i , j , k))
303  + (phi_arr(i , j+1, k+1) - phi_arr(i , j+1, k))
304  + (phi_arr(i+1, j , k+1) - phi_arr(i+1, j , k))
305  + (phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k+1) - phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k)) );
306  }
307 
308  Real dp_dot_dp = dpdx*dpdx + dpdy*dpdy + dpdz*dpdz;
309  Real phi_avg = 0.125 * (
310  phi_arr(i , j , k ) + phi_arr(i , j , k+1) + phi_arr(i , j+1, k ) + phi_arr(i , j+1, k+1)
311  + phi_arr(i+1, j , k ) + phi_arr(i+1, j , k+1) + phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k ) + phi_arr(i+1, j+1, k+1) );
312  dist_arr(i, j, k) = -std::sqrt(dp_dot_dp) + std::sqrt(dp_dot_dp + 2*phi_avg);
313 
314  // DEBUG: output phi instead
315  //dist_arr(i, j, k) = phi_arr(i, j, k);
316  });
317  }
318 }
if
if(l_use_mynn &&start_comp<=RhoKE_comp &&end_comp >=RhoKE_comp)
Definition: ERF_DiffQKEAdjustment.H:2
ERF::mg_verbose
static int mg_verbose
Definition: ERF.H:1028
SolverChoice::poisson_reltol
amrex::Real poisson_reltol
Definition: ERF_DataStruct.H:729
SolverChoice::poisson_abstol
amrex::Real poisson_abstol
Definition: ERF_DataStruct.H:728
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ post_timestep()

void ERF::post_timestep ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)
538 {
539  BL_PROFILE("ERF::post_timestep()");
540 
541 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
542  particleData.Redistribute();
543 #endif
544 
545  if (solverChoice.coupling_type == CouplingType::TwoWay)
546  {
547  int ncomp = vars_new[0][Vars::cons].nComp();
548  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; lev--)
549  {
550  // The quantity that is conserved is not (rho S), but rather (rho S / m^2) where
551  // m is the map scale factor at cell centers
552  // Here we pre-divide (rho S) by m^2 before refluxing
553  for (MFIter mfi(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
554  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
555  const Array4< Real> cons_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].array(mfi);
556  const Array4<const Real> mfx_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x]->const_array(mfi);
557  const Array4<const Real> mfy_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_y]->const_array(mfi);
558  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type == MeshType::ConstantDz) {
559  ParallelFor(bx, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) noexcept
560  {
561  cons_arr(i,j,k,n) /= (mfx_arr(i,j,0)*mfy_arr(i,j,0));
562  });
563  } else {
564  const Array4<const Real> detJ_arr = detJ_cc[lev]->const_array(mfi);
565  ParallelFor(bx, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) noexcept
566  {
567  cons_arr(i,j,k,n) *= detJ_arr(i,j,k) / (mfx_arr(i,j,0)*mfy_arr(i,j,0));
568  });
569  }
570  } // mfi
571 
572  // This call refluxes all "slow" cell-centered variables
573  // (i.e. not density or (rho theta) or velocities) from the lev/lev+1 interface onto lev
574  getAdvFluxReg(lev+1)->Reflux(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], 2, 2, ncomp-2);
575 
576  // Here we multiply (rho S) by m^2 after refluxing
577  for (MFIter mfi(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
578  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
579  const Array4< Real> cons_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].array(mfi);
580  const Array4<const Real> mfx_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x]->const_array(mfi);
581  const Array4<const Real> mfy_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_y]->const_array(mfi);
582  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type == MeshType::ConstantDz) {
583  ParallelFor(bx, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) noexcept
584  {
585  cons_arr(i,j,k,n) *= (mfx_arr(i,j,0)*mfy_arr(i,j,0));
586  });
587  } else {
588  const Array4<const Real> detJ_arr = detJ_cc[lev]->const_array(mfi);
589  ParallelFor(bx, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) noexcept
590  {
591  cons_arr(i,j,k,n) *= (mfx_arr(i,j,0)*mfy_arr(i,j,0)) / detJ_arr(i,j,k);
592  });
593  }
594  } // mfi
595 
596  // We need to do this before anything else because refluxing changes the
597  // values of coarse cells underneath fine grids with the assumption they'll
598  // be over-written by averaging down
599  int src_comp;
600  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev]) {
601  src_comp = 1;
602  } else {
603  src_comp = 0;
604  }
605  int num_comp = ncomp - src_comp;
606  AverageDownTo(lev,src_comp,num_comp);
607  }
608  }
609 
610  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, sum_interval, sum_per)) {
611  sum_integrated_quantities(time);
612  sum_derived_quantities(time);
613  sum_energy_quantities(time);
614  }
615 
616  if (solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Source ||
617  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::Direct ||
618  solverChoice.pert_type == PerturbationType::CPM) {
619  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, pert_interval, -1.)) {
620  turbPert.debug(time);
621  }
622  }
623 
624  if (profile_int > 0 && (nstep+1) % profile_int == 0) {
625  if (destag_profiles) {
626  // all variables cell-centered
627  write_1D_profiles(time);
628  } else {
629  // some variables staggered
630  write_1D_profiles_stag(time);
631  }
632  }
633 
634  if (solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None)
635  {
636  if (rad_datalog_int > 0 && (nstep+1) % rad_datalog_int == 0) {
637  if (rad[0]->hasDatalog()) {
638  rad[0]->WriteDataLog(time);
639  }
640  }
641  }
642 
643  if (output_1d_column) {
644 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
645  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, column_interval, column_per))
646  {
647  int lev_column = 0;
648  for (int lev = finest_level; lev >= 0; lev--)
649  {
650  Real dx_lev = geom[lev].CellSize(0);
651  Real dy_lev = geom[lev].CellSize(1);
652  int i_lev = static_cast<int>(std::floor(column_loc_x / dx_lev));
653  int j_lev = static_cast<int>(std::floor(column_loc_y / dy_lev));
654  if (grids[lev].contains(IntVect(i_lev,j_lev,0))) lev_column = lev;
655  }
656  writeToNCColumnFile(lev_column, column_file_name, column_loc_x, column_loc_y, time);
657  }
658 #else
659  Abort("To output 1D column files ERF must be compiled with NetCDF");
660 #endif
661  }
662 
663  if (output_bndry_planes)
664  {
665  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], time, dt_lev0, bndry_output_planes_interval, bndry_output_planes_per) &&
666  time >= bndry_output_planes_start_time)
667  {
668  bool is_moist = (micro->Get_Qstate_Moist_Size() > 0);
669  m_w2d->write_planes(istep[0], time, vars_new, is_moist);
670  }
671  }
672 
673  // Write plane/line sampler data
674  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep+1, time, dt_lev0, sampler_interval, sampler_per) && (data_sampler) ) {
675  data_sampler->get_sample_data(geom, vars_new);
676  data_sampler->write_sample_data(t_new, istep, ref_ratio, geom);
677  }
678 
679  // Moving terrain
680  if ( solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::MovingFittedMesh )
681  {
682  for (int lev = finest_level; lev >= 0; lev--)
683  {
684  // Copy z_phs_nd and detJ_cc at end of timestep
685  MultiFab::Copy(*z_phys_nd[lev], *z_phys_nd_new[lev], 0, 0, 1, z_phys_nd[lev]->nGrowVect());
686  MultiFab::Copy( *detJ_cc[lev], *detJ_cc_new[lev], 0, 0, 1, detJ_cc[lev]->nGrowVect());
687  MultiFab::Copy(base_state[lev],base_state_new[lev],0,0,BaseState::num_comps,base_state[lev].nGrowVect());
688 
689  make_zcc(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev]);
690  }
691  }
692 
693  bool is_hurricane_tracker_io=false;
694  ParmParse pp("erf");
695  pp.query("is_hurricane_tracker_io", is_hurricane_tracker_io);
696 
697  if(is_hurricane_tracker_io) {
698  if(nstep == 0 or (nstep+1)%m_plot_int_1 == 0){
699  std::string filename = MakeVTKFilename(nstep);
700  Real velmag_threshold = 1e10;
701  pp.query("hurr_track_io_velmag_greater_than", velmag_threshold);
702  if(velmag_threshold==1e10) {
703  Abort("As hurricane tracking IO is active using erf.is_hurricane_tracker_io = true"
704  " there needs to be an input erf.hurr_track_io_velmag_greater_than which specifies the"
705  " magnitude of velocity above which cells will be tagged for refinement.");
706  }
707  int levc=finest_level;
708  MultiFab& U_new = vars_new[levc][Vars::xvel];
709  MultiFab& V_new = vars_new[levc][Vars::yvel];
710  MultiFab& W_new = vars_new[levc][Vars::zvel];
711 
712  HurricaneTracker(levc, U_new, V_new, W_new, velmag_threshold, true);
713  if (ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
714  WriteVTKPolyline(filename,hurricane_track_xy);
715  }
716  }
717  }
718 } // post_timestep

67 
68 void ERF::print_banner (MPI_Comm comm, std::ostream& out)
69 {
70 #ifdef AMREX_USE_MPI
71  int irank = 0;
72  int num_ranks = 1;
73  MPI_Comm_size(comm, &num_ranks);
74  MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &irank);
75 
76  // Only root process does the printing
77  if (irank != 0) return;
78 #else
79  amrex::ignore_unused(comm);
80 #endif
81 
82  auto etime = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
83  auto etimet = std::chrono::system_clock::to_time_t(etime);
84 #ifndef _WIN32
85  char time_buf[64];
86  ctime_r(&etimet, time_buf);
87  const std::string tstamp(time_buf);
88 #else
89  char* time_buf = new char[64];
90  ctime_s(time_buf, 64, &etimet);
91  const std::string tstamp(time_buf);
92 #endif
93 
94  const char* githash1 = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(1);
95  const char* githash2 = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(2);
96 
97  // clang-format off
98  out << dbl_line
99  << " ERF (https://github.com/erf-model/ERF)"
100  << std::endl << std::endl
101  << " ERF Git SHA :: " << githash1 << std::endl
102  << " AMReX Git SHA :: " << githash2 << std::endl
103  << " AMReX version :: " << amrex::Version() << std::endl << std::endl
104  << " Exec. time :: " << tstamp
105  << " Build time :: " << amrex::buildInfoGetBuildDate() << std::endl
106  << " C++ compiler :: " << amrex::buildInfoGetComp()
107  << " " << amrex::buildInfoGetCompVersion() << std::endl << std::endl
108  << " MPI :: "
109 #ifdef AMREX_USE_MPI
110  << "ON (Num. ranks = " << num_ranks << ")" << std::endl
111 #else
112  << "OFF " << std::endl
113 #endif
114  << " GPU :: "
115 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
116  << "ON "
117 #if defined(AMREX_USE_CUDA)
118  << "(Backend: CUDA)"
119 #elif defined(AMREX_USE_HIP)
120  << "(Backend: HIP)"
121 #elif defined(AMREX_USE_SYCL)
122  << "(Backend: SYCL)"
123 #endif
124  << std::endl
125 #else
126  << "OFF" << std::endl
127 #endif
128  << " OpenMP :: "
129 #ifdef AMREX_USE_OMP
130  << "ON (Num. threads = " << omp_get_max_threads() << ")" << std::endl
131 #else
132  << "OFF" << std::endl
133 #endif
134  << std::endl;

Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ project_momenta()

void ERF::project_momenta ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  dt,
amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &  vars 
)

Project the single-level momenta to enforce the anelastic constraint Note that the level may or may not be level 0.

42 {
43  BL_PROFILE("ERF::project_momenta()");
44 
45  // Make sure the solver only sees the levels over which we are solving
46  Vector<BoxArray> ba_tmp; ba_tmp.push_back(mom_mf[Vars::cons].boxArray());
47  Vector<DistributionMapping> dm_tmp; dm_tmp.push_back(mom_mf[Vars::cons].DistributionMap());
48  Vector<Geometry> geom_tmp; geom_tmp.push_back(geom[lev]);
49 
50  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::r0_comp, 1);
51 
52  Vector<MultiFab> rhs;
53  Vector<MultiFab> phi;
54 
55  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB)
56  {
57  rhs.resize(1); rhs[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0, MFInfo(), EBFactory(lev));
58  phi.resize(1); phi[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 1, MFInfo(), EBFactory(lev));
59  } else {
60  rhs.resize(1); rhs[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
61  phi.resize(1); phi[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 1);
62  }
63 
64  auto dxInv = geom[lev].InvCellSizeArray();
65 
66  // Inflow on an x-face -- note only the normal velocity is used in the projection
67  if (domain_bc_type[0] == "Inflow" || domain_bc_type[3] == "Inflow") {
68  (*physbcs_u[lev])(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],
69  IntVect{1,0,0},t_new[lev],BCVars::xvel_bc,false);
70  }
71 
72  // Inflow on a y-face -- note only the normal velocity is used in the projection
73  if (domain_bc_type[1] == "Inflow" || domain_bc_type[4] == "Inflow") {
74  (*physbcs_v[lev])(vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],
75  IntVect{0,1,0},t_new[lev],BCVars::yvel_bc,false);
76  }
77 
78  if (domain_bc_type[0] == "Inflow" || domain_bc_type[3] == "Inflow" ||
79  domain_bc_type[1] == "Inflow" || domain_bc_type[4] == "Inflow") {
80  VelocityToMomentum(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel], IntVect{0},
81  vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel], IntVect{0},
82  vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel], IntVect{0},
83  vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
84  mom_mf[IntVars::xmom],
85  mom_mf[IntVars::ymom],
86  mom_mf[IntVars::zmom],
87  Geom(lev).Domain(),
88  domain_bcs_type);
89  }
90 
91  // If !fixed_density, we must convert (rho u) which came in
92  // to (rho0 u) which is what we will project
93  if (!solverChoice.fixed_density) {
94  ConvertForProjection(mom_mf[Vars::cons], r_hse,
95  mom_mf[IntVars::xmom],
96  mom_mf[IntVars::ymom],
97  mom_mf[IntVars::zmom],
98  Geom(lev).Domain(),
99  domain_bcs_type);
100  }
101 
102  //
103  // ****************************************************************************
104  // Now convert the rho0w MultiFab to hold Omega rather than rhow
105  // ****************************************************************************
106  //
107  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz)
108  {
109  for ( MFIter mfi(rhs[0],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
110  {
111  const Array4<Real const>& rho0u_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::xmom].const_array(mfi);
112  const Array4<Real const>& rho0v_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::ymom].const_array(mfi);
113  const Array4<Real >& rho0w_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::zmom].array(mfi);
114 
115  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
116  const Array4<Real const>& mf_u = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::u_x]->const_array(mfi);
117  const Array4<Real const>& mf_v = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::v_y]->const_array(mfi);
118 
119  //
120  // Define Omega from (rho0 W) but store it in the same array
121  //
122  Box tbz = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
123  ParallelFor(tbz, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
124  if (k == 0) {
125  rho0w_arr(i,j,k) = Real(0.0);
126  } else {
127  Real rho0w = rho0w_arr(i,j,k);
128  rho0w_arr(i,j,k) = OmegaFromW(i,j,k,rho0w,
129  rho0u_arr,rho0v_arr,
130  mf_u,mf_v,z_nd,dxInv);
131  }
132  });
133  } // mfi
134  }
135 
136  // ****************************************************************************
137  // Compute divergence which will form RHS
138  // Note that we replace "rho0w" with the contravariant momentum, Omega
139  // ****************************************************************************
140  Array<MultiFab const*, AMREX_SPACEDIM> rho0_u_const;
141  rho0_u_const[0] = &mom_mf[IntVars::xmom];
142  rho0_u_const[1] = &mom_mf[IntVars::ymom];
143  rho0_u_const[2] = &mom_mf[IntVars::zmom];
144 
145  compute_divergence(lev, rhs[0], rho0_u_const, geom_tmp[0]);
146 
147  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz) {
148  MultiFab::Multiply(rhs[0], *detJ_cc[lev], 0, 0, 1, 0);
149  }
150 
151  Real rhsnorm = rhs[0].norm0();
152  Real rhssum = rhs[0].sum();
153 
154  if (mg_verbose > 0) {
155  Print() << "Max/L2 norm of divergence before solve at level " << lev << " : " << rhsnorm << " " << rhs[0].norm2() << " and sum " << rhssum << std::endl;
156  }
157 
158  // ****************************************************************************
159  //
160  // No need to build the solver if RHS == 0
161  //
162  if (rhsnorm <= solverChoice.poisson_abstol) return;
163  // ****************************************************************************
164 
165  // ****************************************************************************
166  // Initialize phi to 0
167  // (It is essential that we do this in order to fill the corners; these are never
168  // used but the Saxpy requires the values to be initialized.)
169  // ****************************************************************************
170  phi[0].setVal(0.0);
171 
172  Real start_step = static_cast<Real>(ParallelDescriptor::second());
173 
174  // ****************************************************************************
175  // Allocate fluxes
176  // ****************************************************************************
177  Vector<Array<MultiFab,AMREX_SPACEDIM> > fluxes;
178  fluxes.resize(1);
179  for (int idim = 0; idim < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++idim) {
180  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB) {
181  fluxes[0][idim].define(convert(ba_tmp[0], IntVect::TheDimensionVector(idim)), dm_tmp[0], 1, 0, MFInfo(), EBFactory(lev));
182  } else {
183  fluxes[0][idim].define(convert(ba_tmp[0], IntVect::TheDimensionVector(idim)), dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
184  }
185  }
186 
187  // ****************************************************************************
188  // Choose the solver and solve
189  // ****************************************************************************
190 
191  // ****************************************************************************
192  // EB
193  // ****************************************************************************
194  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB) {
195  solve_with_EB_mlmg(lev, rhs, phi, fluxes);
196  } else {
197 
198 #ifdef ERF_USE_FFT
199  Box my_region(ba_tmp[0].minimalBox());
200  bool boxes_make_rectangle = (my_region.numPts() == ba_tmp[0].numPts());
201 #endif
202 
203  // ****************************************************************************
204  // No terrain or grid stretching
205  // ****************************************************************************
206  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::ConstantDz) {
207 #ifdef ERF_USE_FFT
208  if (use_fft) {
209  if (boxes_make_rectangle) {
210  solve_with_fft(lev, rhs[0], phi[0], fluxes[0]);
211  } else {
212  amrex::Warning("FFT won't work unless the union of boxes is rectangular: defaulting to MLMG");
213  solve_with_mlmg(lev, rhs, phi, fluxes);
214  }
215  } else {
216  solve_with_mlmg(lev, rhs, phi, fluxes);
217  }
218 #else
219  if (use_fft) {
220  amrex::Warning("You set use_fft=true but didn't build with USE_FFT = TRUE; defaulting to MLMG");
221  }
222  solve_with_mlmg(lev, rhs, phi, fluxes);
223 #endif
224  } // No terrain or grid stretching
225 
226  // ****************************************************************************
227  // Grid stretching (flat terrain)
228  // ****************************************************************************
229  else if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::StretchedDz) {
230 #ifndef ERF_USE_FFT
231  amrex::Abort("Rebuild with USE_FFT = TRUE so you can use the FFT solver");
232 #else
233  if (!boxes_make_rectangle) {
234  amrex::Abort("FFT won't work unless the union of boxes is rectangular");
235  } else {
236  if (!use_fft) {
237  amrex::Warning("Using FFT even though you didn't set use_fft to true; it's the best choice");
238  }
239  solve_with_fft(lev, rhs[0], phi[0], fluxes[0]);
240  }
241 #endif
242  } // grid stretching
243 
244  // ****************************************************************************
245  // General terrain
246  // ****************************************************************************
247  else if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz) {
248 #ifdef ERF_USE_FFT
249  if (!boxes_make_rectangle) {
250  amrex::Abort("FFT preconditioner for GMRES won't work unless the union of boxes is rectangular");
251  } else {
252  solve_with_gmres(lev, rhs, phi, fluxes);
253  }
254 #else
255  amrex::Abort("Rebuild with USE_FFT = TRUE so you can use the FFT preconditioner for GMRES");
256 #endif
257  } // general terrain
258 
259  } // not EB
260 
261  // ****************************************************************************
262  // Print time in solve
263  // ****************************************************************************
264  Real end_step = static_cast<Real>(ParallelDescriptor::second());
265  if (mg_verbose > 0) {
266  amrex::Print() << "Time in solve " << end_step - start_step << std::endl;
267  }
268 
269  // ****************************************************************************
270  // Subtract dt grad(phi) from the momenta (rho0u, rho0v, Omega)
271  // ****************************************************************************
272  MultiFab::Add(mom_mf[IntVars::xmom],fluxes[0][0],0,0,1,0);
273  MultiFab::Add(mom_mf[IntVars::ymom],fluxes[0][1],0,0,1,0);
274  MultiFab::Add(mom_mf[IntVars::zmom],fluxes[0][2],0,0,1,0);
275 
276  // ****************************************************************************
277  // Define gradp from fluxes -- note that fluxes is dt * change in Gp
278  // ****************************************************************************
279  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][0],0,0,1,0);
280  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][1],0,0,1,0);
281  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][2],0,0,1,0);
282 
283  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
284  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
285  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
286 
287  //
288  // This call is only to verify the divergence after the solve
289  // It is important we do this before computing the rho0w_arr from Omega back to rho0w
290  //
291  // ****************************************************************************
292  // THIS IS SIMPLY VERIFYING THE DIVERGENCE AFTER THE SOLVE
293  // ****************************************************************************
294  //
295  if (mg_verbose > 0)
296  {
297  compute_divergence(lev, rhs[0], rho0_u_const, geom_tmp[0]);
298 
299  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz) {
300  MultiFab::Multiply(rhs[0], *detJ_cc[lev], 0, 0, 1, 0);
301  }
302 
303  Print() << "Max/L2 norm of divergence after solve at level " << lev << " : " << rhs[0].norm0() << " " <<
304  rhs[0].norm2() << " and sum " << rhssum << std::endl;
305 
306 #if 0
307  // FOR DEBUGGING ONLY
308  for ( MFIter mfi(rhs[0],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
309  {
310  const Array4<Real const>& rhs_arr = rhs[0].const_array(mfi);
311  Box bx = mfi.validbox();
312  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
313  if (std::abs(rhs_arr(i,j,k)) > 1.e-10) {
314  amrex::AllPrint() << "RHS AFTER SOLVE AT " <<
315  IntVect(i,j,k) << " " << rhs_arr(i,j,k) << std::endl;
316  }
317  });
318  } // mfi
319 #endif
320 
321  } // mg_verbose
322 
323  //
324  // ****************************************************************************
325  // Now convert the rho0w MultiFab back to holding (rho0w) rather than Omega
326  // ****************************************************************************
327  //
328  if (solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::VariableDz)
329  {
330  for (MFIter mfi(mom_mf[Vars::cons],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
331  {
332  Box tbz = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
333  const Array4<Real >& rho0u_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::xmom].array(mfi);
334  const Array4<Real >& rho0v_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::ymom].array(mfi);
335  const Array4<Real >& rho0w_arr = mom_mf[IntVars::zmom].array(mfi);
336  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
337  const Array4<Real const>& mf_u = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::u_x]->const_array(mfi);
338  const Array4<Real const>& mf_v = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::v_y]->const_array(mfi);
339  ParallelFor(tbz, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
340  Real omega = rho0w_arr(i,j,k);
341  rho0w_arr(i,j,k) = WFromOmega(i,j,k,omega,
342  rho0u_arr,rho0v_arr,
343  mf_u,mf_v,z_nd,dxInv);
344  });
345  } // mfi
346  }
347 
348  // If !fixed_density, we must convert (rho0 u) back
349  // to (rho0 u) which is what we will pass back out
350  if (!solverChoice.fixed_density) {
351  ConvertForProjection(r_hse, mom_mf[Vars::cons],
352  mom_mf[IntVars::xmom],
353  mom_mf[IntVars::ymom],
354  mom_mf[IntVars::zmom],
355  Geom(lev).Domain(),
356  domain_bcs_type);
357  }
358 
359  // ****************************************************************************
360  // Update pressure variable with phi -- note that phi is dt * change in pressure
361  // ****************************************************************************
362  MultiFab::Saxpy(pp_inc[lev], 1.0/l_dt, phi[0],0,0,1,1);
363 }
ConvertForProjection
void ConvertForProjection(const MultiFab &den_div, const MultiFab &den_mlt, MultiFab &xmom, MultiFab &ymom, MultiFab &zmom, const Box &domain, const Vector< BCRec > &domain_bcs_type_h)
Definition: ERF_ConvertForProjection.cpp:25
OmegaFromW
AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real OmegaFromW(int &i, int &j, int &k, amrex::Real w, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &u_arr, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &v_arr, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &mf_u, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &mf_v, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &dxInv)
Definition: ERF_TerrainMetrics.H:415
WFromOmega
AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real WFromOmega(int &i, int &j, int &k, amrex::Real omega, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &u_arr, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &v_arr, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &mf_u, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &mf_v, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &dxInv)
Definition: ERF_TerrainMetrics.H:465
ERF::use_fft
static bool use_fft
Definition: ERF.H:1029
ERF::compute_divergence
void compute_divergence(int lev, amrex::MultiFab &rhs, amrex::Array< amrex::MultiFab const *, AMREX_SPACEDIM > rho0_u_const, amrex::Geometry const &geom_at_lev)
Definition: ERF_ComputeDivergence.cpp:10
ERF::solve_with_mlmg
void solve_with_mlmg(int lev, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &rhs, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &p, amrex::Vector< amrex::Array< amrex::MultiFab, AMREX_SPACEDIM >> &fluxes)
Definition: ERF_SolveWithMLMG.cpp:40
ERF::solve_with_gmres
void solve_with_gmres(int lev, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &rhs, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &p, amrex::Vector< amrex::Array< amrex::MultiFab, AMREX_SPACEDIM >> &fluxes)
Definition: ERF_SolveWithGMRES.cpp:12
ERF::solve_with_EB_mlmg
void solve_with_EB_mlmg(int lev, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &rhs, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &p, amrex::Vector< amrex::Array< amrex::MultiFab, AMREX_SPACEDIM >> &fluxes)
Definition: ERF_SolveWithEBMLMG.cpp:19
MicVar_Morr::omega
@ omega
Definition: ERF_Morrison.H:53
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ project_velocity()

void ERF::project_velocity ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  dt 
)

Project the single-level velocity field to enforce the anelastic constraint Note that the level may or may not be level 0.

11 {
12  BL_PROFILE("ERF::project_velocity()");
13  VelocityToMomentum(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel], IntVect{0},
14  vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel], IntVect{0},
15  vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel], IntVect{0},
16  vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
17  rU_new[lev], rV_new[lev], rW_new[lev],
18  Geom(lev).Domain(), domain_bcs_type);
19 
20  Vector<MultiFab> tmp_mom;
21 
22  tmp_mom.push_back(MultiFab(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],make_alias,0,1));
23  tmp_mom.push_back(MultiFab(rU_new[lev],make_alias,0,1));
24  tmp_mom.push_back(MultiFab(rV_new[lev],make_alias,0,1));
25  tmp_mom.push_back(MultiFab(rW_new[lev],make_alias,0,1));
26 
27  project_momenta(lev, l_dt, tmp_mom);
28 
29  MomentumToVelocity(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],
30  vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],
31  vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],
32  vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
33  rU_new[lev], rV_new[lev], rW_new[lev],
34  Geom(lev).Domain(), domain_bcs_type);
35  }
ERF::project_momenta
void project_momenta(int lev, amrex::Real dt, amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &vars)
Definition: ERF_PoissonSolve.cpp:41
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ project_velocity_tb()

void ERF::project_velocity_tb ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  dt,
amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab > &  vars 
)

Project the single-level velocity field to enforce incompressibility with a thin body

21 {
22  BL_PROFILE("ERF::project_velocity_tb()");
23  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.mesh_type == MeshType::ConstantDz);
24 
25  // Make sure the solver only sees the levels over which we are solving
26  Vector<BoxArray> ba_tmp; ba_tmp.push_back(vmf[Vars::cons].boxArray());
27  Vector<DistributionMapping> dm_tmp; dm_tmp.push_back(vmf[Vars::cons].DistributionMap());
28  Vector<Geometry> geom_tmp; geom_tmp.push_back(geom[lev]);
29 
30  // Use the default settings
31  LPInfo info;
32  std::unique_ptr<MLPoisson> p_mlpoisson;
33 #if 0
34  if (overset_imask[0]) {
35  // Add overset mask around thin body
36  p_mlpoisson = std::make_unique<MLPoisson>(geom, grids, dmap, GetVecOfConstPtrs(overset_imask), info);
37  }
38  else
39 #endif
40  {
41  // Use the default settings
42  p_mlpoisson = std::make_unique<MLPoisson>(geom_tmp, ba_tmp, dm_tmp, info);
43  }
44 
45  auto bclo = get_projection_bc(Orientation::low);
46  auto bchi = get_projection_bc(Orientation::high);
47  bool need_adjust_rhs = (projection_has_dirichlet(bclo) || projection_has_dirichlet(bchi)) ? false : true;
48  p_mlpoisson->setDomainBC(bclo, bchi);
49 
50  if (lev > 0) {
51  p_mlpoisson->setCoarseFineBC(nullptr, ref_ratio[lev-1], LinOpBCType::Neumann);
52  }
53 
54  p_mlpoisson->setLevelBC(0, nullptr);
55 
56  Vector<MultiFab> rhs;
57  Vector<MultiFab> phi;
58  Vector<Array<MultiFab,AMREX_SPACEDIM> > fluxes;
59  Vector<Array<MultiFab,AMREX_SPACEDIM> > deltaf; // f^* - f^{n-1}
60  Vector<Array<MultiFab,AMREX_SPACEDIM> > u_plus_dtdf; // u + dt*deltaf
61 
62  // Used to pass array of const MFs to ComputeDivergence
63  Array<MultiFab const*, AMREX_SPACEDIM> u;
64 
65  rhs.resize(1);
66  phi.resize(1);
67  fluxes.resize(1);
68  deltaf.resize(1);
69  u_plus_dtdf.resize(1);
70 
71  rhs[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
72  phi[0].define(ba_tmp[0], dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
73  rhs[0].setVal(0.0);
74  phi[0].setVal(0.0);
75 
76  for (int idim = 0; idim < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++idim) {
77  fluxes[0][idim].define(convert(ba_tmp[0], IntVect::TheDimensionVector(idim)), dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
78  u_plus_dtdf[0][idim].define(convert(ba_tmp[0], IntVect::TheDimensionVector(idim)), dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
79 
80  deltaf[0][idim].define(convert(ba_tmp[0], IntVect::TheDimensionVector(idim)), dm_tmp[0], 1, 0);
81  deltaf[0][idim].setVal(0.0); // start with f^* == f^{n-1}
82  }
83 
84 #if 0
85  // DEBUG
86  u[0] = &(vmf[Vars::xvel]);
87  u[1] = &(vmf[Vars::yvel]);
88  u[2] = &(vmf[Vars::zvel]);
89  computeDivergence(rhs[0], u, geom[0]);
90  Print() << "Max norm of divergence before solve at level 0 : " << rhs[0].norm0() << std::endl;
91 #endif
92 
93  for (int itp = 0; itp < solverChoice.ncorr; ++itp)
94  {
95  // Calculate u + dt*deltaf
96  for (int idim = 0; idim < 3; ++idim) {
97  MultiFab::Copy(u_plus_dtdf[0][idim], deltaf[0][idim], 0, 0, 1, 0);
98  u_plus_dtdf[0][0].mult(-l_dt,0,1,0);
99  }
100  MultiFab::Add(u_plus_dtdf[0][0], vmf[Vars::xvel], 0, 0, 1, 0);
101  MultiFab::Add(u_plus_dtdf[0][1], vmf[Vars::yvel], 0, 0, 1, 0);
102  MultiFab::Add(u_plus_dtdf[0][2], vmf[Vars::zvel], 0, 0, 1, 0);
103 
104  u[0] = &(u_plus_dtdf[0][0]);
105  u[1] = &(u_plus_dtdf[0][1]);
106  u[2] = &(u_plus_dtdf[0][2]);
107  computeDivergence(rhs[0], u, geom_tmp[0]);
108 
109 #if 0
110  // DEBUG
111  if (itp==0) {
112  for (MFIter mfi(rhs[0], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
113  {
114  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
115  const Array4<Real const>& divU = rhs[0].const_array(mfi);
116  const Array4<Real const>& uarr = vmf[Vars::xvel].const_array(mfi);
117  const Array4<Real const>& varr = vmf[Vars::yvel].const_array(mfi);
118  const Array4<Real const>& warr = vmf[Vars::zvel].const_array(mfi);
119  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
120  {
121  if ((i>=120) && (i<=139) && (j==0) && ((k>=127)&&(k<=128))) {
122  amrex::AllPrint() << "before project div"<<IntVect(i,j,k)<<" = "<< divU(i,j,k)
123  << " u: " << uarr(i,j,k) << " " << uarr(i+1,j,k)
124  << " v: " << varr(i,j,k) << " " << varr(i,j+1,k)
125  << " w: " << warr(i,j,k) << " " << warr(i,j,k+1)
126  << std::endl;
127  }
128  });
129  }
130  }
131 #endif
132 
133  // If all Neumann BCs, adjust RHS to make sure we can converge
134  if (need_adjust_rhs) {
135  Real offset = volWgtSumMF(lev, rhs[0], 0, false);
136  // amrex::Print() << "Poisson solvability offset = " << offset << std::endl;
137  rhs[0].plus(-offset, 0, 1);
138  }
139 
140  // Initialize phi to 0
141  phi[0].setVal(0.0);
142 
143  MLMG mlmg(*p_mlpoisson);
144  int max_iter = 100;
145  mlmg.setMaxIter(max_iter);
146 
147  mlmg.setVerbose(mg_verbose);
148  //mlmg.setBottomVerbose(mg_verbose);
149 
150  // solve for dt*p
151  mlmg.solve(GetVecOfPtrs(phi),
152  GetVecOfConstPtrs(rhs),
153  solverChoice.poisson_reltol,
154  solverChoice.poisson_abstol);
155 
156  mlmg.getFluxes(GetVecOfArrOfPtrs(fluxes));
157 
158  // Calculate new intermediate body force with updated gradp
159  if (thin_xforce[lev]) {
160  MultiFab::Copy( deltaf[0][0], fluxes[0][0], 0, 0, 1, 0);
161  ApplyInvertedMask(deltaf[0][0], *xflux_imask[0]);
162  }
163  if (thin_yforce[lev]) {
164  MultiFab::Copy( deltaf[0][1], fluxes[0][1], 0, 0, 1, 0);
165  ApplyInvertedMask(deltaf[0][1], *yflux_imask[0]);
166  }
167  if (thin_zforce[lev]) {
168  MultiFab::Copy( deltaf[0][2], fluxes[0][2], 0, 0, 1, 0);
169  ApplyInvertedMask(deltaf[0][2], *zflux_imask[0]);
170  }
171 
172  // DEBUG
173  // for (MFIter mfi(rhs[0], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
174  // {
175  // const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
176  // const Array4<Real const>& dfz_arr = deltaf[0][2].const_array(mfi);
177  // ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
178  // {
179  // if ((i>=120) && (i<=139) && (j==0) && (k==128)) {
180  // amrex::AllPrint()
181  // << " piter" << itp
182  // << " dfz"<<IntVect(i,j,k)<<" = "<< dfz_arr(i,j,k)
183  // << std::endl;
184  // }
185  // });
186  // }
187 
188  // Update pressure variable with phi -- note that phi is change in pressure, not the full pressure
189  MultiFab::Saxpy(pp_inc[lev], 1.0, phi[0],0,0,1,0);
190 
191  // Subtract grad(phi) from the velocity components
192  Real beta = 1.0;
193  MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::xvel], beta, fluxes[0][0], 0, 0, 1, 0);
194  MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::yvel], beta, fluxes[0][1], 0, 0, 1, 0);
195  MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::zvel], beta, fluxes[0][2], 0, 0, 1, 0);
196  if (thin_xforce[lev]) {
197  ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::xvel], *xflux_imask[0]);
198  }
199  if (thin_yforce[lev]) {
200  ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::yvel], *yflux_imask[0]);
201  }
202  if (thin_zforce[lev]) {
203  ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::zvel], *zflux_imask[0]);
204  }
205  } // itp: pressure-force iterations
206 
207  // ****************************************************************************
208  // Define gradp from fluxes -- note that fluxes is dt * change in Gp
209  // ****************************************************************************
210  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][0],0,0,1,0);
211  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][1],0,0,1,0);
212  MultiFab::Saxpy(gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz],-1.0/l_dt,fluxes[0][2],0,0,1,0);
213 
214  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
215  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
216  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].FillBoundary(geom_tmp[0].periodicity());
217 
218  // Subtract grad(phi) from the velocity components
219 // Real beta = 1.0;
220 // for (int ilev = lev_min; ilev <= lev_max; ++ilev) {
221 // MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::xvel], beta, fluxes[0][0], 0, 0, 1, 0);
222 // MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::yvel], beta, fluxes[0][1], 0, 0, 1, 0);
223 // MultiFab::Saxpy(vmf[Vars::zvel], beta, fluxes[0][2], 0, 0, 1, 0);
224 // if (thin_xforce[lev]) {
225 // ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::xvel], *xflux_imask[0]);
226 // }
227 // if (thin_yforce[lev]) {
228 // ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::yvel], *yflux_imask[0]);
229 // }
230 // if (thin_zforce[lev]) {
231 // ApplyMask(vmf[Vars::zvel], *zflux_imask[0]);
232 // }
233 // }
234 
235 #if 0
236  // Confirm that the velocity is now divergence free
237  u[0] = &(vmf[Vars::xvel]);
238  u[1] = &(vmf[Vars::yvel]);
239  u[2] = &(vmf[Vars::zvel]);
240  computeDivergence(rhs[0], u, geom_tmp[0]);
241  Print() << "Max norm of divergence after solve at level " << lev << " : " << rhs[0].norm0() << std::endl;
242 
243 #endif
244 }
offset
AMREX_FORCE_INLINE IntVect offset(const int face_dir, const int normal)
Definition: ERF_ReadBndryPlanes.cpp:28
ApplyInvertedMask
AMREX_GPU_HOST AMREX_FORCE_INLINE void ApplyInvertedMask(amrex::MultiFab &dst, const amrex::iMultiFab &imask, const int nghost=0)
Definition: ERF_Utils.H:409
ERF::get_projection_bc
amrex::Array< amrex::LinOpBCType, AMREX_SPACEDIM > get_projection_bc(amrex::Orientation::Side side) const noexcept
Definition: ERF_SolveWithMLMG.cpp:17
ERF::projection_has_dirichlet
bool projection_has_dirichlet(amrex::Array< amrex::LinOpBCType, AMREX_SPACEDIM > bcs) const
Definition: ERF_PoissonSolve_tb.cpp:8
ERF::volWgtSumMF
amrex::Real volWgtSumMF(int lev, const amrex::MultiFab &mf, int comp, bool finemask)

SolverChoice::ncorr
