◆ WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()

void ERF::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain ( const std::string &  plotfilename,
int  nlevels,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf_nd,
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  varnames,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::Geometry > &  my_geom,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< int > &  level_steps,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::IntVect > &  my_ref_ratio,
const std::string &  versionName = "HyperCLaw-V1.1",
const std::string &  levelPrefix = "Level_",
const std::string &  mfPrefix = "Cell",
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  extra_dirs = amrex::Vector<std::string>() 
) const
1591 {
1592  BL_PROFILE("WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()");
1593 
1594  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(nlevels <= mf.size());
1595  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(nlevels <= rr.size()+1);
1596  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(nlevels <= level_steps.size());
1597  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(mf[0]->nComp() == varnames.size());
1598 
1599  bool callBarrier(false);
1600  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(plotfilename, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
1601  if (!extra_dirs.empty()) {
1602  for (const auto& d : extra_dirs) {
1603  const std::string ed = plotfilename+"/"+d;
1604  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(ed, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
1605  }
1606  }
1607  ParallelDescriptor::Barrier();
1608 
1609  if (ParallelDescriptor::MyProc() == ParallelDescriptor::NProcs()-1) {
1610  Vector<BoxArray> boxArrays(nlevels);
1611  for(int level(0); level < boxArrays.size(); ++level) {
1612  boxArrays[level] = mf[level]->boxArray();
1613  }
1614 
1615  auto f = [=]() {
1616  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::IO_Buffer_Size);
1617  std::string HeaderFileName(plotfilename + "/Header");
1618  std::ofstream HeaderFile;
1619  HeaderFile.rdbuf()->pubsetbuf(io_buffer.dataPtr(), io_buffer.size());
1620  HeaderFile.open(HeaderFileName.c_str(), std::ofstream::out |
1621  std::ofstream::trunc |
1622  std::ofstream::binary);
1623  if( ! HeaderFile.good()) FileOpenFailed(HeaderFileName);
1624  WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain(HeaderFile, nlevels, boxArrays, varnames,
1625  my_geom, time, level_steps, rr, versionName,
1626  levelPrefix, mfPrefix);
1627  };
1628 
1629  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
1630  AsyncOut::Submit(std::move(f));
1631  } else {
1632  f();
1633  }
1634  }
1635 
1636  std::string mf_nodal_prefix = "Nu_nd";
1637  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level)
1638  {
1639  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
1640  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf[level],
1641  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix),
1642  true);
1643  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf_nd[level],
1644  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix),
1645  true);
1646  } else {
1647  const MultiFab* data;
1648  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab> mf_tmp;
1649  if (mf[level]->nGrowVect() != 0) {
1650  mf_tmp = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(mf[level]->boxArray(),
1651  mf[level]->DistributionMap(),
1652  mf[level]->nComp(), 0, MFInfo(),
1653  mf[level]->Factory());
1654  MultiFab::Copy(*mf_tmp, *mf[level], 0, 0, mf[level]->nComp(), 0);
1655  data = mf_tmp.get();
1656  } else {
1657  data = mf[level];
1658  }
1659  VisMF::Write(*data , MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix));
1660  VisMF::Write(*mf_nd[level], MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix));
1661  }
1662  }
1663 }

◆ writeNow()

bool ERF::writeNow ( const amrex::Real  cur_time,
const amrex::Real  dt,
const int  nstep,
const int  plot_int,
const amrex::Real  plot_per 
)
2259 {
2260  bool write_now = false;
2261 
2262  if ( plot_int > 0 && (nstep % plot_int == 0) ) {
2263  write_now = true;
2264 
2265  } else if (plot_per > 0.0) {
2266 
2267  // Check to see if we've crossed a plot_per interval by comparing
2268  // the number of intervals that have elapsed for both the current
2269  // time and the time at the beginning of this timestep.
2270 
2271  const Real eps = std::numeric_limits<Real>::epsilon() * Real(10.0) * std::abs(cur_time);
2272 
2273  int num_per_old = static_cast<int>(std::floor((cur_time-eps-dt_lev) / plot_per));
2274  int num_per_new = static_cast<int>(std::floor((cur_time-eps ) / plot_per));
2275 
2276  // Before using these, however, we must test for the case where we're
2277  // within machine epsilon of the next interval. In that case, increment
2278  // the counter, because we have indeed reached the next plot_per interval
2279  // at this point.
2280 
2281  const Real next_plot_time = (num_per_old + 1) * plot_per;
2282 
2283  if ((num_per_new == num_per_old) && std::abs(cur_time - next_plot_time) <= eps)
2284  {
2285  num_per_new += 1;
2286  }
2287 
2288  // Similarly, we have to account for the case where the old time is within
2289  // machine epsilon of the beginning of this interval, so that we don't double
2290  // count that time threshold -- we already plotted at that time on the last timestep.
2291 
2292  if ((num_per_new != num_per_old) && std::abs((cur_time - dt_lev) - next_plot_time) <= eps)
2293  num_per_old += 1;
2294 
2295  if (num_per_old != num_per_new)
2296  write_now = true;
2297  }
2298  return write_now;
2299 }
module_model_constants::epsilon
real(c_double), parameter epsilon
Definition: ERF_module_model_constants.F90:12

◆ WritePlotFile()

void ERF::WritePlotFile ( int  which,
PlotFileType  plotfile_type,
amrex::Vector< std::string >  plot_var_names 
)
262 {
263  const Vector<std::string> varnames = PlotFileVarNames(plot_var_names);
264  const int ncomp_mf = varnames.size();
265 
266  int ncomp_cons = vars_new[0][Vars::cons].nComp();
267 
268  if (ncomp_mf == 0) return;
269 
270  // We Fillpatch here because some of the derived quantities require derivatives
271  // which require ghost cells to be filled. We do not need to call FillPatcher
272  // because we don't need to set interior fine points.
273  // NOTE: the momenta here are only used as scratch space, the momenta themselves are not fillpatched
274 
275  // Level 0 FilLPatch
276  FillPatch(0, t_new[0], {&vars_new[0][Vars::cons], &vars_new[0][Vars::xvel],
277  &vars_new[0][Vars::yvel], &vars_new[0][Vars::zvel]});
278 
279  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
280  bool fillset = false;
281  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev], {&vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], &vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],
282  &vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel], &vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]},
283  {&vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
284  &rU_new[lev], &rV_new[lev], &rW_new[lev]},
285  base_state[lev], base_state[lev], fillset);
286  }
287 
288  // Get qmoist pointers if using moisture
289  bool use_moisture = (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None);
290  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
291  for (int mvar(0); mvar<qmoist[lev].size(); ++mvar) {
292  qmoist[lev][mvar] = micro->Get_Qmoist_Ptr(lev,mvar);
293  }
294  }
295 
296  // Vector of MultiFabs for cell-centered data
297  Vector<MultiFab> mf(finest_level+1);
298  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
299  mf[lev].define(grids[lev], dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
300  }
301 
302  // Vector of MultiFabs for nodal data
303  Vector<MultiFab> mf_nd(finest_level+1);
304  if ( SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
305  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
306  BoxArray nodal_grids(grids[lev]); nodal_grids.surroundingNodes();
307  mf_nd[lev].define(nodal_grids, dmap[lev], 3, 0);
308  mf_nd[lev].setVal(0.);
309  }
310  }
311 
312  // Vector of MultiFabs for face-centered velocity
313  Vector<MultiFab> mf_u(finest_level+1);
314  Vector<MultiFab> mf_v(finest_level+1);
315  Vector<MultiFab> mf_w(finest_level+1);
316  if (m_plot_face_vels) {
317  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
318  BoxArray grid_stag_u(grids[lev]); grid_stag_u.surroundingNodes(0);
319  BoxArray grid_stag_v(grids[lev]); grid_stag_v.surroundingNodes(1);
320  BoxArray grid_stag_w(grids[lev]); grid_stag_w.surroundingNodes(2);
321  mf_u[lev].define(grid_stag_u, dmap[lev], 1, 0);
322  mf_v[lev].define(grid_stag_v, dmap[lev], 1, 0);
323  mf_w[lev].define(grid_stag_w, dmap[lev], 1, 0);
324  MultiFab::Copy(mf_u[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],0,0,1,0);
325  MultiFab::Copy(mf_v[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],0,0,1,0);
326  MultiFab::Copy(mf_w[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],0,0,1,0);
327  }
328  }
329 
330  // Array of MultiFabs for cell-centered velocity
331  Vector<MultiFab> mf_cc_vel(finest_level+1);
332 
333  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity" ) ||
334  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity" ) ||
335  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity" ) ||
336  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "magvel" ) ||
337  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_x") ||
338  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_y") ||
339  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_z") ) {
340 
341  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
342  mf_cc_vel[lev].define(grids[lev], dmap[lev], AMREX_SPACEDIM, IntVect(1,1,1));
343  mf_cc_vel[lev].setVal(-1.e20);
344  average_face_to_cellcenter(mf_cc_vel[lev],0,
345  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],
346  &vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],
347  &vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
348  } // lev
349  } // if (vel or vort)
350 
351  // We need ghost cells if computing vorticity
352  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_x")||
353  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_y") ||
354  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "vorticity_z") )
355  {
356  amrex::Interpolater* mapper = &cell_cons_interp;
357  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
358  {
359  Vector<MultiFab*> fmf = {&(mf_cc_vel[lev]), &(mf_cc_vel[lev])};
360  Vector<Real> ftime = {t_new[lev], t_new[lev]};
361  Vector<MultiFab*> cmf = {&mf_cc_vel[lev-1], &mf_cc_vel[lev-1]};
362  Vector<Real> ctime = {t_new[lev], t_new[lev]};
363 
364  FillBdyCCVels(mf_cc_vel,lev-1);
365 
366  // Call FillPatch which ASSUMES that all ghost cells at lev-1 have already been filled
367  FillPatchTwoLevels(mf_cc_vel[lev], mf_cc_vel[lev].nGrowVect(), IntVect(0,0,0),
368  t_new[lev], cmf, ctime, fmf, ftime,
369  0, 0, mf_cc_vel[lev].nComp(), geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
370  refRatio(lev-1), mapper, domain_bcs_type,
371  BaseBCVars::rho0_bc_comp);
372  } // lev
373  FillBdyCCVels(mf_cc_vel);
374  } // if (vort)
375 
376 
377  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
378  {
379  int mf_comp = 0;
380 
381  BoxArray ba(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].boxArray());
382  DistributionMapping dm = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].DistributionMap();
383 
384  // First, copy any of the conserved state variables into the output plotfile
385  for (int i = 0; i < cons_names.size(); ++i) {
386  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, cons_names[i])) {
387  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],i,mf_comp,1,0);
388  mf_comp++;
389  }
390  }
391 
392  // Next, check for velocities
393  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity")) {
394  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], mf_cc_vel[lev], 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
395  mf_comp += 1;
396  }
397  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity")) {
398  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], mf_cc_vel[lev], 1, mf_comp, 1, 0);
399  mf_comp += 1;
400  }
401  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity")) {
402  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], mf_cc_vel[lev], 2, mf_comp, 1, 0);
403  mf_comp += 1;
404  }
405 
406  // Finally, check for any derived quantities and compute them, inserting
407  // them into our output multifab
408  auto calculate_derived = [&](const std::string& der_name,
409  MultiFab& src_mf,
410  decltype(derived::erf_dernull)& der_function)
411  {
412  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, der_name)) {
413  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, 1);
414 #ifdef _OPENMP
415 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
416 #endif
417  for (MFIter mfi(dmf, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
418  {
419  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
420  auto& dfab = dmf[mfi];
421  auto& sfab = src_mf[mfi];
422  der_function(bx, dfab, 0, 1, sfab, Geom(lev), t_new[0], nullptr, lev);
423  }
424 
425  mf_comp++;
426  }
427  };
428 
429  bool ismoist = (solverChoice.moisture_type != MoistureType::None);
430 
431  // Note: All derived variables must be computed in order of "derived_names" defined in ERF.H
432  calculate_derived("soundspeed", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_dersoundspeed);
433  if (ismoist) {
434  calculate_derived("temp", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_dermoisttemp);
435  } else {
436  calculate_derived("temp", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_dertemp);
437  }
438  calculate_derived("theta", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_dertheta);
439  calculate_derived("KE", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_derKE);
440  calculate_derived("scalar", vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], derived::erf_derscalar);
441  calculate_derived("vorticity_x", mf_cc_vel[lev] , derived::erf_dervortx);
442  calculate_derived("vorticity_y", mf_cc_vel[lev] , derived::erf_dervorty);
443  calculate_derived("vorticity_z", mf_cc_vel[lev] , derived::erf_dervortz);
444  calculate_derived("magvel" , mf_cc_vel[lev] , derived::erf_dermagvel);
445 
446  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::r0_comp , 1);
447  MultiFab p_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::p0_comp , 1);
448  MultiFab th_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, BaseState::th0_comp, 1);
449 
450  MultiFab pressure;
451 
452  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 0) {
453  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pressure") ||
454  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_pres") ||
455  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx") ||
456  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy") ||
457  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdz"))
458  {
459  int ng = (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx") || containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy") ||
460  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdz")) ? 1 : 0;
461 
462  // Allocate space for pressure
463  pressure.define(ba,dm,1,ng);
464 
465  if (ng > 0) {
466  // Default to p_hse as a way of filling ghost cells at domain boundaries
467  MultiFab::Copy(pressure,p_hse,0,0,1,1);
468  }
469 #ifdef _OPENMP
470 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
471  #endif
472  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
473  {
474  const Box& gbx = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(ng,ng,0));
475 
476  const Array4<Real >& p_arr = pressure.array(mfi);
477  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
478  const int ncomp = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].nComp();
479 
480  ParallelFor(gbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
481  {
482  Real qv_for_p = (use_moisture && (ncomp > RhoQ1_comp)) ? S_arr(i,j,k,RhoQ1_comp)/S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) : 0;
483  const Real rhotheta = S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp);
484  p_arr(i, j, k) = getPgivenRTh(rhotheta,qv_for_p);
485  });
486  } // mfi
487  pressure.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
488  } // compute compressible pressure
489  } // not anelastic
490  else {
491  // Copy p_hse into pressure if using anelastic
492  pressure.define(ba,dm,1,0);
493  MultiFab::Copy(pressure,p_hse,0,0,1,0);
494  }
495 
496  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "divU"))
497  {
498  // TODO TODO TODO -- we need to convert w to omega here!!
499  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, 1);
500  Array<MultiFab const*, AMREX_SPACEDIM> u;
501  u[0] = &(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel]);
502  u[1] = &(vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel]);
503  u[2] = &(vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]);
504  compute_divergence (lev, dmf, u, geom[lev]);
505  mf_comp += 1;
506  }
507 
508  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse"))
509  {
510  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],p_hse,0,mf_comp,1,0);
511  mf_comp += 1;
512  }
513  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dens_hse"))
514  {
515  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],r_hse,0,mf_comp,1,0);
516  mf_comp += 1;
517  }
518  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "theta_hse"))
519  {
520  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],th_hse,0,mf_comp,1,0);
521  mf_comp += 1;
522  }
523 
524  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pressure"))
525  {
526  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1) {
527  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], p_hse, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
528  } else {
529  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], pressure, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
530  }
531 
532  mf_comp += 1;
533  } // pressure
534 
535  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_pres"))
536  {
537  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1) {
538  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], pp_inc[lev], 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
539  } else {
540  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], pressure, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
541  MultiFab::Subtract(mf[lev],p_hse,0,mf_comp,1,IntVect{0});
542  }
543  mf_comp += 1;
544  }
545 
546  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_dens"))
547  {
548 #ifdef _OPENMP
549 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
550 #endif
551  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
552  {
553  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
554  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
555  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
556  const Array4<Real const>& r0_arr = r_hse.const_array(mfi);
557  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
558  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) - r0_arr(i,j,k);
559  });
560  }
561  mf_comp ++;
562  }
563 
564  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "eq_pot_temp"))
565  {
566 #ifdef _OPENMP
567 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
568 #endif
569  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
570  {
571  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
572  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
573  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
574  const Array4<Real const>& p_arr = pressure.const_array(mfi);
575  const int ncomp = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].nComp();
576  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
577  Real qv = (use_moisture && (ncomp > RhoQ1_comp)) ? S_arr(i,j,k,RhoQ1_comp)/S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) : 0.0;
578  Real qc = (use_moisture && (ncomp > RhoQ2_comp)) ? S_arr(i,j,k,RhoQ2_comp)/S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) : 0.0;
579  Real T = getTgivenRandRTh(S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp), S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp), qv);
580  Real fac = Cp_d + Cp_l*(qv + qc);
581  Real pv = erf_esatw(T)*100.0;
582 
583  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = T*std::pow((p_arr(i,j,k) - pv)/p_0, -R_d/fac)*std::exp(L_v*qv/(fac*T)) ;
584  });
585  }
586  mf_comp ++;
587  }
588 
589  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "terrain_IB_mask"))
590  {
591  MultiFab* terrain_blank = terrain_blanking[lev].get();
592  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*terrain_blank,0,mf_comp,1,0);
593  mf_comp ++;
594  }
595 
596 #ifdef ERF_USE_WINDFARM
597  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "num_turb") and
598  (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::Fitch or solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::EWP or
599  solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::SimpleAD or solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::GeneralAD) )
600  {
601  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],Nturb[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
602  mf_comp ++;
603  }
604 
605  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "SMark0") and
606  (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::Fitch or solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::EWP or
607  solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::SimpleAD or solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::GeneralAD) )
608  {
609  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],SMark[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
610  mf_comp ++;
611  }
612 
613  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "SMark1") and
614  (solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::SimpleAD or solverChoice.windfarm_type == WindFarmType::GeneralAD))
615  {
616  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],SMark[lev],1,mf_comp,1,0);
617  mf_comp ++;
618  }
619 
620 #endif
621 
622  // **********************************************************************************************
623  // Allocate space if we are computing any pressure gradients
624  // **********************************************************************************************
625 
626  Vector<MultiFab> gradp_temp; gradp_temp.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
627  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx") ||
628  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy") ||
629  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdz") ||
630  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_x") ||
631  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_y"))
632  {
633  gradp_temp[GpVars::gpx].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, 1); gradp_temp[GpVars::gpx].setVal(0.);
634  gradp_temp[GpVars::gpy].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, 1); gradp_temp[GpVars::gpy].setVal(0.);
635  gradp_temp[GpVars::gpz].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, 1); gradp_temp[GpVars::gpz].setVal(0.);
636  }
637 
638  // **********************************************************************************************
639  // These are based on computing gradient of full pressure
640  // **********************************************************************************************
641 
642  if (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 0) {
643  if ( (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx")) ||
644  (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy")) ||
645  (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdz")) ) {
646  BCRec const* bcrec_ptr = domain_bcs_type_d.data();
647  compute_gradp(pressure, geom[lev], *z_phys_nd[lev].get(), *z_phys_cc[lev].get(), bcrec_ptr, get_eb(lev), gradp_temp, solverChoice);
648  }
649  }
650 
651  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx"))
652  {
653  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
654  {
655  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
656  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
657  const Array4<Real const>& gpx_arr = (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1) ?
658  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpx].array(mfi) : gradp_temp[GpVars::gpx].array(mfi);
659  const Array4<Real const>& mf_mx_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x]->const_array(mfi);
660  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
661  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpx_arr(i+1,j,k) + gpx_arr(i,j,k)) * mf_mx_arr(i,j,0);
662  });
663  }
664  mf_comp ++;
665  } // dpdx
666  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy"))
667  {
668  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
669  {
670  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
671  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
672  const Array4<Real const>& gpy_arr = (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1) ?
673  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpy].array(mfi) : gradp_temp[GpVars::gpy].array(mfi);
674  const Array4<Real const>& mf_my_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_y]->const_array(mfi);
675  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
676  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpy_arr(i,j+1,k) + gpy_arr(i,j,k)) * mf_my_arr(i,j,0);
677  });
678  }
679  mf_comp ++;
680  } // dpdy
681  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdz"))
682  {
683  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
684  {
685  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
686  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
687  const Array4<Real const>& gpz_arr = (solverChoice.anelastic[lev] == 1) ?
688  gradp[lev][GpVars::gpz].array(mfi) : gradp_temp[GpVars::gpz].array(mfi);
689  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
690  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpz_arr(i,j,k+1) + gpz_arr(i,j,k));
691  });
692  }
693  mf_comp ++;
694  } // dpdz
695 
696  // **********************************************************************************************
697  // These are based on computing gradient of basestate pressure
698  // **********************************************************************************************
699 
700  if ( (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_x")) ||
701  (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_y")) ) {
702  BCRec const* bcrec_ptr = domain_bcs_type_d.data();
703  compute_gradp(p_hse, geom[lev], *z_phys_nd[lev].get(), *z_phys_cc[lev].get(), bcrec_ptr, get_eb(lev), gradp_temp, solverChoice);
704  }
705 
706  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_x"))
707  {
708  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
709  {
710  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
711  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
712  const Array4<Real const>& gpx_arr = gradp_temp[0].array(mfi);
713  const Array4<Real const>& mf_mx_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x]->const_array(mfi);
714  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
715  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpx_arr(i+1,j,k) + gpx_arr(i,j,k)) * mf_mx_arr(i,j,0);
716  });
717  }
718  mf_comp += 1;
719  } // pres_hse_x
720 
721  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_y"))
722  {
723  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
724  {
725  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
726  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
727  const Array4<Real const>& gpy_arr = gradp_temp[1].array(mfi);
728  const Array4<Real const>& mf_my_arr = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_y]->const_array(mfi);
729  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
730  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpy_arr(i,j+1,k) + gpy_arr(i,j,k)) * mf_my_arr(i,j,0);
731  });
732  }
733  mf_comp += 1;
734  } // pres_hse_y
735 
736  // **********************************************************************************************
737  // Metric terms
738  // **********************************************************************************************
739 
740  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
741  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_phys"))
742  {
743  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
744  mf_comp ++;
745  }
746 
747  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "detJ"))
748  {
749  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*detJ_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
750  mf_comp ++;
751  }
752  } // use_terrain
753 
754  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "mapfac")) {
755 #ifdef _OPENMP
756 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
757 #endif
758  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
759  {
760  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
761  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
762  const Array4<Real>& mf_m = mapfac[lev][MapFacType::m_x]->array(mfi);
763  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
764  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = mf_m(i,j,0);
765  });
766  }
767  mf_comp ++;
768  }
769 
770 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
771  if (solverChoice.use_real_bcs) {
772  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "lat_m")) {
773 #ifdef _OPENMP
774 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
775 #endif
776  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
777  {
778  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
779  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
780  const Array4<Real>& data = lat_m[lev]->array(mfi);
781  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
782  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,0);
783  });
784  }
785  mf_comp ++;
786  } // lat_m
787 
788  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "lon_m")) {
789 #ifdef _OPENMP
790 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
791 #endif
792  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
793  {
794  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
795  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
796  const Array4<Real>& data = lon_m[lev]->array(mfi);
797  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
798  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,0);
799  });
800  }
801  mf_comp ++;
802  } // lon_m
803  } // use_real_bcs
804 #endif
805 
806 
807  if (solverChoice.time_avg_vel) {
808  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "u_t_avg")) {
809 #ifdef _OPENMP
810 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
811 #endif
812  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
813  {
814  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
815  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
816  const Array4<Real>& data = vel_t_avg[lev]->array(mfi);
817  const Real norm = t_avg_cnt[lev];
818  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
819  {
820  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,k,0) / norm;
821  });
822  }
823  mf_comp ++;
824  }
825 
826  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "v_t_avg")) {
827 #ifdef _OPENMP
828 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
829 #endif
830  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
831  {
832  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
833  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
834  const Array4<Real>& data = vel_t_avg[lev]->array(mfi);
835  const Real norm = t_avg_cnt[lev];
836  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
837  {
838  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,k,1) / norm;
839  });
840  }
841  mf_comp ++;
842  }
843 
844  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "w_t_avg")) {
845 #ifdef _OPENMP
846 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
847 #endif
848  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
849  {
850  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
851  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
852  const Array4<Real>& data = vel_t_avg[lev]->array(mfi);
853  const Real norm = t_avg_cnt[lev];
854  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
855  {
856  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,k,2) / norm;
857  });
858  }
859  mf_comp ++;
860  }
861 
862  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "umag_t_avg")) {
863 #ifdef _OPENMP
864 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
865 #endif
866  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
867  {
868  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
869  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
870  const Array4<Real>& data = vel_t_avg[lev]->array(mfi);
871  const Real norm = t_avg_cnt[lev];
872  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
873  {
874  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = data(i,j,k,3) / norm;
875  });
876  }
877  mf_comp ++;
878  }
879  }
880 
881  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "nut")) {
882  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, 1);
883  MultiFab cmf(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], make_alias, 0, 1); // to provide rho only
884 #ifdef _OPENMP
885 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
886 #endif
887  for (MFIter mfi(dmf, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
888  {
889  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
890  auto prim = dmf[mfi].array();
891  auto const cons = cmf[mfi].const_array();
892  auto const diff = (*eddyDiffs_lev[lev])[mfi].const_array();
893  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
894  {
895  const Real rho = cons(i, j, k, Rho_comp);
896  const Real Kmv = diff(i, j, k, EddyDiff::Mom_v);
897  prim(i,j,k) = Kmv / rho;
898  });
899  }
900 
901  mf_comp++;
902  }
903 
904  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "Kmv")) {
905  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*eddyDiffs_lev[lev],EddyDiff::Mom_v,mf_comp,1,0);
906  mf_comp ++;
907  }
908  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "Kmh")) {
909  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*eddyDiffs_lev[lev],EddyDiff::Mom_h,mf_comp,1,0);
910  mf_comp ++;
911  }
912  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "Khv")) {
913  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*eddyDiffs_lev[lev],EddyDiff::Theta_v,mf_comp,1,0);
914  mf_comp ++;
915  }
916  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "Khh")) {
917  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*eddyDiffs_lev[lev],EddyDiff::Theta_h,mf_comp,1,0);
918  mf_comp ++;
919  }
920  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "Lturb")) {
921  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*eddyDiffs_lev[lev],EddyDiff::Turb_lengthscale,mf_comp,1,0);
922  mf_comp ++;
923  }
924  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "walldist")) {
925  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*walldist[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
926  mf_comp ++;
927  }
928  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "diss")) {
929  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*SFS_diss_lev[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
930  mf_comp ++;
931  }
932 
933  // TODO: The size of the q variables can vary with different
934  // moisture models. Therefore, certain components may
935  // reside at different indices. For example, Kessler is
936  // warm but precipitating. This puts qp at index 3.
937  // However, SAM is cold and precipitating so qp is index 4.
938  // Need to built an external enum struct or a better pathway.
939 
940  // NOTE: Protect against accessing non-existent data
941  if (use_moisture) {
942  int n_qstate_moist = micro->Get_Qstate_Moist_Size();
943 
944  // Moist density
945  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "moist_density"))
946  {
947  int n_start = RhoQ1_comp; // qv
948  int n_end = RhoQ2_comp; // qc
949  if (n_qstate_moist > 3) n_end = RhoQ3_comp; // qi
950  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
951  for (int n_comp(n_start); n_comp <= n_end; ++n_comp) {
952  MultiFab::Add(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
953  }
954  mf_comp += 1;
955  }
956 
957  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qv") && (n_qstate_moist >= 1))
958  {
959  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ1_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
960  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
961  mf_comp += 1;
962  }
963 
964  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qc") && (n_qstate_moist >= 2))
965  {
966  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ2_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
967  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
968  mf_comp += 1;
969  }
970 
971  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qi") && (n_qstate_moist >= 4))
972  {
973  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ3_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
974  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
975  mf_comp += 1;
976  }
977 
978  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qrain") && (n_qstate_moist >= 3))
979  {
980  int n_start = (n_qstate_moist > 3) ? RhoQ4_comp : RhoQ3_comp;
981  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_start , mf_comp, 1, 0);
982  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
983  mf_comp += 1;
984  }
985 
986  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qsnow") && (n_qstate_moist >= 5))
987  {
988  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ5_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
989  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
990  mf_comp += 1;
991  }
992 
993  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qgraup") && (n_qstate_moist >= 6))
994  {
995  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], RhoQ6_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
996  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
997  mf_comp += 1;
998  }
999 
1000  // Precipitating + non-precipitating components
1001  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1002  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qt"))
1003  {
1004  int n_start = RhoQ1_comp; // qv
1005  int n_end = n_start + n_qstate_moist;
1006  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_start, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1007  for (int n_comp(n_start+1); n_comp < n_end; ++n_comp) {
1008  MultiFab::Add(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1009  }
1010  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
1011  mf_comp += 1;
1012  }
1013 
1014  // Non-precipitating components
1015  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1016  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qn"))
1017  {
1018  int n_start = RhoQ1_comp; // qv
1019  int n_end = RhoQ2_comp; // qc
1020  if (n_qstate_moist > 3) n_end = RhoQ3_comp; // qi
1021  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_start, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1022  for (int n_comp(n_start+1); n_comp <= n_end; ++n_comp) {
1023  MultiFab::Add(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1024  }
1025  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
1026  mf_comp += 1;
1027  }
1028 
1029  // Precipitating components
1030  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1031  if(containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qp") && (n_qstate_moist >= 3))
1032  {
1033  int n_start = (n_qstate_moist > 3) ? RhoQ4_comp : RhoQ3_comp;
1034  int n_end = ncomp_cons - 1;
1035  MultiFab::Copy( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_start, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1036  for (int n_comp(n_start+1); n_comp <= n_end; ++n_comp) {
1037  MultiFab::Add( mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], n_comp, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1038  }
1039  MultiFab::Divide(mf[lev], vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], Rho_comp , mf_comp, 1, 0);
1040  mf_comp += 1;
1041  }
1042 
1043  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qsat"))
1044  {
1045 #ifdef _OPENMP
1046 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
1047 #endif
1048  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
1049  {
1050  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
1051  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
1052  const Array4<Real const>& p_arr = pressure.array(mfi);
1053  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
1054  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
1055  {
1056  Real qv = S_arr(i,j,k,RhoQ1_comp) / S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp);
1057  Real T = getTgivenRandRTh(S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp), S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp), qv);
1058  Real p = p_arr(i,j,k) * Real(0.01);
1059  erf_qsatw(T, p, derdat(i,j,k,mf_comp));
1060  });
1061  }
1062  mf_comp ++;
1063  }
1064 
1065  if ( (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::Kessler) ||
1066  (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::Morrison_NoIce) ||
1067  (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::SAM_NoIce) )
1068  {
1069  int offset = (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::Morrison_NoIce) ? 5 : 0;
1070  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "rain_accum"))
1071  {
1072  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*(qmoist[lev][offset]),0,mf_comp,1,0);
1073  mf_comp += 1;
1074  }
1075  }
1076  else if ( (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::SAM) ||
1077  (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::Morrison) )
1078  {
1079  int offset = (solverChoice.moisture_type == MoistureType::Morrison) ? 5 : 0;
1080  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "rain_accum"))
1081  {
1082  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*(qmoist[lev][offset]),0,mf_comp,1,0);
1083  mf_comp += 1;
1084  }
1085  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "snow_accum"))
1086  {
1087  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*(qmoist[lev][offset+1]),0,mf_comp,1,0);
1088  mf_comp += 1;
1089  }
1090  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "graup_accum"))
1091  {
1092  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*(qmoist[lev][offset+2]),0,mf_comp,1,0);
1093  mf_comp += 1;
1094  }
1095  }
1096  } // use_moisture
1097 
1098 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
1099  const auto& particles_namelist( particleData.getNames() );
1100  for (ParticlesNamesVector::size_type i = 0; i < particles_namelist.size(); i++) {
1101  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, std::string(particles_namelist[i]+"_count"))) {
1102  MultiFab temp_dat(mf[lev].boxArray(), mf[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, 0);
1103  temp_dat.setVal(0);
1104  particleData[particles_namelist[i]]->Increment(temp_dat, lev);
1105  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], temp_dat, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1106  mf_comp += 1;
1107  }
1108  }
1109 
1110  Vector<std::string> particle_mesh_plot_names(0);
1111  particleData.GetMeshPlotVarNames( particle_mesh_plot_names );
1112  for (int i = 0; i < particle_mesh_plot_names.size(); i++) {
1113  std::string plot_var_name(particle_mesh_plot_names[i]);
1114  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, plot_var_name) ) {
1115  MultiFab temp_dat(mf[lev].boxArray(), mf[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, 1);
1116  temp_dat.setVal(0);
1117  particleData.GetMeshPlotVar(plot_var_name, temp_dat, lev);
1118  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], temp_dat, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1119  mf_comp += 1;
1120  }
1121  }
1122 #endif
1123 
1124  {
1125  Vector<std::string> microphysics_plot_names;
1126  micro->GetPlotVarNames(microphysics_plot_names);
1127  for (auto& plot_name : microphysics_plot_names) {
1128  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, plot_name)) {
1129  MultiFab temp_dat(mf[lev].boxArray(), mf[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, 1);
1130  temp_dat.setVal(0);
1131  micro->GetPlotVar(plot_name, temp_dat, lev);
1132  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], temp_dat, 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1133  mf_comp += 1;
1134  }
1135  }
1136  }
1137 
1138  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "volfrac")) {
1139  if ( solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB ||
1140  solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::ImmersedForcing)
1141  {
1142  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], EBFactory(lev).getVolFrac(), 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1143  } else {
1144  mf[lev].setVal(1.0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1145  }
1146  mf_comp += 1;
1147  }
1148 
1149 #ifdef ERF_COMPUTE_ERROR
1150  // Next, check for error in velocities and if desired, output them -- note we output none or all, not just some
1151  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "xvel_err") ||
1152  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "yvel_err") ||
1153  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "zvel_err"))
1154  {
1155  //
1156  // Moving terrain ANALYTICAL
1157  //
1158  Real H = geom[lev].ProbHi()[2];
1159  Real Ampl = 0.16;
1160  Real wavelength = 100.;
1161  Real kp = 2. * PI / wavelength;
1162  Real g = CONST_GRAV;
1163  Real omega = std::sqrt(g * kp);
1164  Real omega_t = omega * t_new[lev];
1165 
1166  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
1167 
1168 #ifdef _OPENMP
1169 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
1170 #endif
1171  for (MFIter mfi(mf[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
1172  {
1173  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
1174  Box xbx(bx); xbx.surroundingNodes(0);
1175  const Array4<Real> xvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
1176  const Array4<Real> zvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
1177 
1178  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
1179 
1180  ParallelFor(xbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
1181  {
1182  Real x = i * dx[0];
1183  Real z = 0.25 * (z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1));
1184 
1185  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1186  z -= z_base;
1187 
1188  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
1189 
1190  xvel_arr(i,j,k) -= -Ampl * omega * fac * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1191  });
1192 
1193  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
1194  {
1195  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
1196  Real z = 0.25 * ( z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i+1,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k));
1197 
1198  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1199  z -= z_base;
1200 
1201  Real fac = std::sinh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
1202 
1203  zvel_arr(i,j,k) -= Ampl * omega * fac * std::cos(kp * x - omega_t);
1204  });
1205  }
1206 
1207  MultiFab temp_mf(mf[lev].boxArray(), mf[lev].DistributionMap(), AMREX_SPACEDIM, 0);
1208  average_face_to_cellcenter(temp_mf,0,
1209  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
1210 
1211  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "xvel_err")) {
1212  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,0,mf_comp,1,0);
1213  mf_comp += 1;
1214  }
1215  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "yvel_err")) {
1216  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,1,mf_comp,1,0);
1217  mf_comp += 1;
1218  }
1219  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "zvel_err")) {
1220  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,2,mf_comp,1,0);
1221  mf_comp += 1;
1222  }
1223 
1224  // Now restore the velocities to what they were
1225 #ifdef _OPENMP
1226 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
1227 #endif
1228  for (MFIter mfi(mf[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
1229  {
1230  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
1231  Box xbx(bx); xbx.surroundingNodes(0);
1232 
1233  const Array4<Real> xvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
1234  const Array4<Real> zvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
1235 
1236  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
1237 
1238  ParallelFor(xbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
1239  {
1240  Real x = i * dx[0];
1241  Real z = 0.25 * (z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1));
1242  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1243 
1244  z -= z_base;
1245 
1246  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
1247  xvel_arr(i,j,k) += -Ampl * omega * fac * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1248  });
1249  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
1250  {
1251  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
1252  Real z = 0.25 * ( z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i+1,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k));
1253  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1254 
1255  z -= z_base;
1256  Real fac = std::sinh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
1257 
1258  zvel_arr(i,j,k) += Ampl * omega * fac * std::cos(kp * x - omega_t);
1259  });
1260  }
1261  } // end xvel_err, yvel_err, zvel_err
1262 
1263  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pp_err"))
1264  {
1265  // Moving terrain ANALYTICAL
1266 #ifdef _OPENMP
1267 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
1268 #endif
1269  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
1270  {
1271  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
1272  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
1273  const Array4<Real const>& p0_arr = p_hse.const_array(mfi);
1274  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
1275 
1276  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
1277  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
1278  const Array4<Real const>& p_arr = pressure.const_array(mfi);
1279  const Array4<Real const>& r0_arr = r_hse.const_array(mfi);
1280 
1281  Real H = geom[lev].ProbHi()[2];
1282  Real Ampl = 0.16;
1283  Real wavelength = 100.;
1284  Real kp = 2. * PI / wavelength;
1285  Real g = CONST_GRAV;
1286  Real omega = std::sqrt(g * kp);
1287  Real omega_t = omega * t_new[lev];
1288 
1289  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
1290  {
1291  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = p_arr(i,j,k) - p0_arr(i,j,k);
1292 
1293  Real rho_hse = r0_arr(i,j,k);
1294 
1295  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
1296  Real z = 0.125 * ( z_nd(i,j,k ) + z_nd(i+1,j,k ) + z_nd(i,j+1,k ) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k )
1297  +z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i+1,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k+1) );
1298  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
1299 
1300  z -= z_base;
1301  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
1302  Real pprime_exact = -(Ampl * omega * omega / kp) * fac *
1303  std::sin(kp * x - omega_t) * r0_arr(i,j,k);
1304 
1305  derdat(i,j,k,mf_comp) -= pprime_exact;
1306  });
1307  }
1308  mf_comp += 1;
1309  }
1310 #endif
1311 
1312  if (solverChoice.rad_type != RadiationType::None) {
1313  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qsrc_sw")) {
1314  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], *(qheating_rates[lev]), 0, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1315  mf_comp += 1;
1316  }
1317  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qsrc_lw")) {
1318  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev], *(qheating_rates[lev]), 1, mf_comp, 1, 0);
1319  mf_comp += 1;
1320  }
1321  }
1322 
1323  }
1324 
1325  if (solverChoice.terrain_type == TerrainType::EB)
1326  {
1327  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1328  EB_set_covered(mf[lev], 0.0);
1329  }
1330  }
1331 
1332  // Fill terrain distortion MF (nu_nd)
1333  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
1334  for (int lev(0); lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1335  MultiFab::Copy(mf_nd[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],0,2,1,0);
1336  Real dz = Geom()[lev].CellSizeArray()[2];
1337  for (MFIter mfi(mf_nd[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
1338  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
1339  Array4<Real> mf_arr = mf_nd[lev].array(mfi);
1340  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
1341  {
1342  mf_arr(i,j,k,2) -= k * dz;
1343  });
1344  }
1345  }
1346  }
1347 
1348  std::string plotfilename;
1349  std::string plotfilenameU;
1350  std::string plotfilenameV;
1351  std::string plotfilenameW;
1352  if (which == 1) {
1353  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_1, istep[0], 5);
1354  plotfilenameU = Concatenate(plot_file_1+"U", istep[0], 5);
1355  plotfilenameV = Concatenate(plot_file_1+"V", istep[0], 5);
1356  plotfilenameW = Concatenate(plot_file_1+"W", istep[0], 5);
1357  } else if (which == 2) {
1358  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_2, istep[0], 5);
1359  plotfilenameU = Concatenate(plot_file_2+"U", istep[0], 5);
1360  plotfilenameV = Concatenate(plot_file_2+"V", istep[0], 5);
1361  plotfilenameW = Concatenate(plot_file_2+"W", istep[0], 5);
1362  }
1363 
1364  // LSM writes it's own data
1365  if (which==1 && plot_lsm) {
1366  lsm.Plot_Lsm_Data(t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1367  }
1368 
1369 #ifdef ERF_USE_RRTMGP
1370  /*
1371  // write additional RRTMGP data
1372  // TODO: currently single level only
1373  if (which==1 && plot_rad) {
1374  rad[0]->writePlotfile(plot_file_1, t_new[0], istep[0]);
1375  }
1376  */
1377 #endif
1378 
1379  // Single level
1380  if (finest_level == 0)
1381  {
1382  if (plotfile_type == PlotFileType::Amrex)
1383  {
1384  Print() << "Writing native plotfile " << plotfilename << "\n";
1385  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
1386  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1387  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
1388  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_nd),
1389  varnames,
1390  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1391  } else {
1392  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1393  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
1394  varnames,
1395  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1396  }
1397  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
1398 
1399  if (m_plot_face_vels) {
1400  Print() << "Writing face velocities" << std::endl;
1401  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameU, finest_level+1,
1402  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_u),
1403  {"x_velocity_stag"},
1404  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1405  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameV, finest_level+1,
1406  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_v),
1407  {"y_velocity_stag"},
1408  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1409  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameW, finest_level+1,
1410  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_w),
1411  {"z_velocity_stag"},
1412  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
1413  }
1414 
1415 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
1416  particleData.writePlotFile(plotfilename);
1417 #endif
1418 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1419  } else if (plotfile_type == PlotFileType::Netcdf) {
1420  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.terrain_type != TerrainType::StaticFittedMesh);
1421  int lev = 0;
1422  int l_which = 0;
1423  const Real* p_lo = geom[lev].ProbLo();
1424  const Real* p_hi = geom[lev].ProbHi();
1425  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSize();
1426  writeNCPlotFile(lev, l_which, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep,
1427  {p_lo[0],p_lo[1],p_lo[2]},{p_hi[0],p_hi[1],p_hi[2]}, {dx[0],dx[1],dx[2]},
1428  geom[lev].Domain(), t_new[0], start_bdy_time);
1429 #endif
1430  } else {
1431  // Here we assume the plotfile_type is PlotFileType::None
1432  Print() << "Writing no plotfile since plotfile_type is none" << std::endl;
1433  }
1434 
1435  } else { // Multilevel
1436 
1437  if (plotfile_type == PlotFileType::Amrex) {
1438 
1439  int lev0 = 0;
1440  int desired_ratio = std::max(std::max(ref_ratio[lev0][0],ref_ratio[lev0][1]),ref_ratio[lev0][2]);
1441  bool any_ratio_one = ( ( (ref_ratio[lev0][0] == 1) || (ref_ratio[lev0][1] == 1) ) ||
1442  (ref_ratio[lev0][2] == 1) );
1443  for (int lev = 1; lev < finest_level; lev++) {
1444  any_ratio_one = any_ratio_one ||
1445  ( ( (ref_ratio[lev][0] == 1) || (ref_ratio[lev][1] == 1) ) ||
1446  (ref_ratio[lev][2] == 1) );
1447  }
1448 
1449  if (any_ratio_one && m_expand_plotvars_to_unif_rr)
1450  {
1451  Vector<IntVect> r2(finest_level);
1452  Vector<Geometry> g2(finest_level+1);
1453  Vector<MultiFab> mf2(finest_level+1);
1454 
1455  mf2[0].define(grids[0], dmap[0], ncomp_mf, 0);
1456 
1457  // Copy level 0 as is
1458  MultiFab::Copy(mf2[0],mf[0],0,0,mf[0].nComp(),0);
1459 
1460  // Define a new multi-level array of Geometry's so that we pass the new "domain" at lev > 0
1461  Array<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodicity =
1462  {Geom()[lev0].isPeriodic(0),Geom()[lev0].isPeriodic(1),Geom()[lev0].isPeriodic(2)};
1463  g2[lev0].define(Geom()[lev0].Domain(),&(Geom()[lev0].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
1464 
1465  r2[0] = IntVect(desired_ratio/ref_ratio[lev0][0],
1466  desired_ratio/ref_ratio[lev0][1],
1467  desired_ratio/ref_ratio[lev0][2]);
1468 
1469  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1470  if (lev > 1) {
1471  r2[lev-1][0] = r2[lev-2][0] * desired_ratio / ref_ratio[lev-1][0];
1472  r2[lev-1][1] = r2[lev-2][1] * desired_ratio / ref_ratio[lev-1][1];
1473  r2[lev-1][2] = r2[lev-2][2] * desired_ratio / ref_ratio[lev-1][2];
1474  }
1475 
1476  mf2[lev].define(refine(grids[lev],r2[lev-1]), dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
1477 
1478  // Set the new problem domain
1479  Box d2(Geom()[lev].Domain());
1480  d2.refine(r2[lev-1]);
1481 
1482  g2[lev].define(d2,&(Geom()[lev].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
1483  }
1484 
1485  //
1486  // We need to make a temporary that is the size of ncomp_mf
1487  // in order to not get an out of bounds error
1488  // even though the values will not be used
1489  //
1490  Vector<BCRec> temp_domain_bcs_type;
1491  temp_domain_bcs_type.resize(ncomp_mf);
1492 
1493  //
1494  // Do piecewise constant interpolation of mf into mf2
1495  //
1496  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1497  Interpolater* mapper_c = &pc_interp;
1498  InterpFromCoarseLevel(mf2[lev], t_new[lev], mf[lev],
1499  0, 0, ncomp_mf,
1500  geom[lev], g2[lev],
1501  null_bc_for_fill, 0, null_bc_for_fill, 0,
1502  r2[lev-1], mapper_c, temp_domain_bcs_type, 0);
1503  }
1504 
1505  // Define an effective ref_ratio which is isotropic to be passed into WriteMultiLevelPlotfile
1506  Vector<IntVect> rr(finest_level);
1507  for (int lev = 0; lev < finest_level; ++lev) {
1508  rr[lev] = IntVect(desired_ratio);
1509  }
1510 
1511  Print() << "Writing plotfile " << plotfilename << "\n";
1512  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
1513  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1514  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf2),
1515  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_nd),
1516  varnames,
1517  g2, t_new[0], istep, rr);
1518  } else {
1519  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1520  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf2), varnames,
1521  g2, t_new[0], istep, rr);
1522  }
1523 
1524  } else {
1525  if (SolverChoice::mesh_type != MeshType::ConstantDz) {
1526  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1527  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
1528  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_nd),
1529  varnames,
1530  geom, t_new[0], istep, ref_ratio);
1531  } else {
1532  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
1533  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames,
1534  geom, t_new[0], istep, ref_ratio);
1535  }
1536  if (m_plot_face_vels) {
1537  Print() << "Writing face velocities" << std::endl;
1538  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameU, finest_level+1,
1539  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_u),
1540  {"x_velocity_stag"},
1541  geom, t_new[0], istep, ref_ratio);
1542  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameV, finest_level+1,
1543  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_v),
1544  {"y_velocity_stag"},
1545  geom, t_new[0], istep, ref_ratio);
1546  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilenameW, finest_level+1,
1547  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_w),
1548  {"z_velocity_stag"},
1549  geom, t_new[0], istep, ref_ratio);
1550  }
1551  } // ref_ratio test
1552 
1553  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
1554 
1555 #ifdef ERF_USE_PARTICLES
1556  particleData.writePlotFile(plotfilename);
1557 #endif
1558 
1559 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1560  } else if (plotfile_type == PlotFileType::Netcdf) {
1561  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.terrain_type != TerrainType::StaticFittedMesh);
1562  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
1563  for (int which_box = 0; which_box < num_boxes_at_level[lev]; which_box++) {
1564  Box bounding_region = (lev == 0) ? geom[lev].Domain() : boxes_at_level[lev][which_box];
1565  const Real* p_lo = geom[lev].ProbLo();
1566  const Real* p_hi = geom[lev].ProbHi();
1567  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
1568  writeNCPlotFile(lev, which_box, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep,
1569  {p_lo[0],p_lo[1],p_lo[2]},{p_hi[0],p_hi[1],p_hi[2]}, {dx[0],dx[1],dx[2]},
1570  bounding_region, t_new[0], start_bdy_time);
1571  }
1572  }
1573 #endif
1574  }
1575  } // end multi-level
1576 }
PI
constexpr amrex::Real PI

ERF::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain

derived::erf_dersoundspeed

Definition: ERF_Derive.cpp:58
module_model_constants::g
real(c_double), parameter g
Definition: ERF_module_model_constants.F90:19
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ WriteSubvolume()

void ERF::WriteSubvolume ( )
10 {
11  ParmParse pp("erf.subvol");
12 
13  Vector<Real> origin;
14  Vector< int> ncell;
15  Vector<Real> delta;
16 
17  // **************************************************************
18  // Read in the origin, number of cells in each dir, and resolution
19  // **************************************************************
20  pp.getarr("origin",origin,0,AMREX_SPACEDIM);
21  pp.getarr("nxnynz", ncell,0,AMREX_SPACEDIM);
22  pp.getarr("dxdydz", delta,0,AMREX_SPACEDIM);
23 
24  int lev_for_sub = 0;
25 
26  bool found = false;
27  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; i++) {
28  if (!found) {
29  if (almostEqual(delta[0],geom[i].CellSize(0)) &&
30  almostEqual(delta[1],geom[i].CellSize(1)) &&
31  almostEqual(delta[2],geom[i].CellSize(2)) ) {
32 
33  // amrex::Print() << "XDIR " << delta[0] << " " << geom[i].CellSize(0) << std::endl;
34  // amrex::Print() << "YDIR " << delta[1] << " " << geom[i].CellSize(1) << std::endl;
35  // amrex::Print() << "ZDIR " << delta[2] << " " << geom[i].CellSize(2) << std::endl;
36  amrex::Print() << "Resolution specified matches that of level " << i << std::endl;
37  found = true;
38  lev_for_sub = i;
39  }
40  }
41  }
42 
43  if (!found) {
44  amrex::Abort("Resolution specified for subvol does not match the resolution of any of the levels.");
45  }
46 
47  // **************************************************************
48  // Now that we know which level we're at, we can figure out which (i,j,k) the origin corresponds to
49  // Note we use 1.0001 as a fudge factor since the division of two reals --> integer will do a floor
50  // **************************************************************
51  int i0 = static_cast<int>((origin[0] - geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(0)) * 1.0001 / delta[0]);
52  int j0 = static_cast<int>((origin[1] - geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(1)) * 1.0001 / delta[1]);
53  int k0 = static_cast<int>((origin[2] - geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(2)) * 1.0001 / delta[2]);
54 
55  found = false;
56  if (almostEqual(geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(0)+i0*delta[0],origin[0]) &&
57  almostEqual(geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(1)+j0*delta[1],origin[1]) &&
58  almostEqual(geom[lev_for_sub].ProbLo(2)+k0*delta[2],origin[2]) )
59  {
60  amrex::Print() << "Specified origin is the lower left corner of cell " << IntVect(i0,j0,k0) << std::endl;
61  found = true;
62  }
63 
64  if (!found) {
65  amrex::Abort("Origin specified does not correspond to a node at this level.");
66  }
67 
68  Box domain(geom[lev_for_sub].Domain());
69 
70  Box bx(IntVect(i0,j0,k0),IntVect(i0+ncell[0]-1,j0+ncell[1]-1,k0+ncell[2]-1));
71  amrex::Print() << "Box requested is " << bx << std::endl;
72 
73  if (!domain.contains(bx))
74  {
75  amrex::Abort("Box requested is larger than the existing domain");
76  }
77 
78  Vector<int> cs(3);
79  int count = pp.countval("chunk_size");
80  if (count > 0) {
81  pp.queryarr("chunk_size",cs,0,AMREX_SPACEDIM);
82  } else {
83  cs[0] = max_grid_size[0][0];
84  cs[1] = max_grid_size[0][1];
85  cs[2] = max_grid_size[0][2];
86  }
87  IntVect chunk_size(cs[0],cs[1],cs[2]);
88 
89  BoxArray ba(bx);
90  ba.maxSize(chunk_size);
91 
92  amrex::Print() << "BoxArray is " << ba << std::endl;
93 
94  int ncomp_mf = AMREX_SPACEDIM;
95 
96  DistributionMapping dm(ba);
97 
98  MultiFab mf(ba, dm, ncomp_mf, 0);
99 
100  MultiFab mf_cc_vel(grids[lev_for_sub], dmap[lev_for_sub], ncomp_mf, 0);
101  average_face_to_cellcenter(mf_cc_vel,0,
102  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev_for_sub][Vars::xvel],
103  &vars_new[lev_for_sub][Vars::yvel],
104  &vars_new[lev_for_sub][Vars::zvel]});
105 
106  mf.ParallelCopy(mf_cc_vel,0,0,AMREX_SPACEDIM,0,0);
107 
108  std::string subvol_filename = Concatenate(subvol_file, istep[0], 5);
109 
110  Vector<std::string> varnames;
111  varnames.push_back("x_velocity");
112  varnames.push_back("y_velocity");
113  varnames.push_back("z_velocity");
114 
115  Real time = t_new[lev_for_sub];
116 
117  amrex::Print() <<"Writing subvolume into " << subvol_filename << std::endl;
118  WriteSingleLevelPlotfile(subvol_filename,mf,varnames,geom[lev_for_sub],time,istep[0]);
119 }
module_mp_morr_two_moment::cs
real(c_double), private cs
Definition: ERF_module_mp_morr_two_moment.F90:202
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ WriteVTKPolyline()

void ERF::WriteVTKPolyline ( const std::string &  filename,
amrex::Vector< std::array< amrex::Real, 2 >> &  points_xy 
)
595 {
596  std::ofstream vtkfile(filename);
597  if (!vtkfile.is_open()) {
598  std::cerr << "Error: Cannot open file " << filename << std::endl;
599  return;
600  }
601 
602  int num_points = points_xy.size();
603  if (num_points == 0) {
604  vtkfile << "# vtk DataFile Version 3.0\n";
605  vtkfile << "Hurricane Track\n";
606  vtkfile << "ASCII\n";
607  vtkfile << "DATASET POLYDATA\n";
608  vtkfile << "POINTS " << num_points << " float\n";
609  vtkfile.close();
610  return;
611  }
612  if (num_points < 2) {
613  points_xy.push_back(points_xy[0]);
614  }
615  num_points = points_xy.size();
616 
617  vtkfile << "# vtk DataFile Version 3.0\n";
618  vtkfile << "Hurricane Track\n";
619  vtkfile << "ASCII\n";
620  vtkfile << "DATASET POLYDATA\n";
621 
622  // Write points (Z=0 assumed)
623  vtkfile << "POINTS " << num_points << " float\n";
624  for (const auto& pt : points_xy) {
625  vtkfile << pt[0] << " " << pt[1] << " 10000.0\n";
626  }
627 
628  // Write polyline connectivity
629  vtkfile << "LINES 1 " << num_points + 1 << "\n";
630  vtkfile << num_points << " ";
631  for (int i = 0; i < num_points; ++i) {
632  vtkfile << i << " ";
633  }
634  vtkfile << "\n";
635 
636  vtkfile.close();
637 }
